    40	
    41	Each employee is entitled to 22 working days of paid annual leave (public holidays are not included). Employees may take their full 22-day
    42	entitlement at once or split it into multiple periods, provided that each segment lasts at least 6 consecutive working days. All accrued
    43	leave must be used within 2 years of employment.
    44	
    45	With mutual agreement between the employer and employee, unused leave can be carried forward for 2--3 years, as long as the employee takes at
    46	least 10 days of vacation annually. If the employer denies an employee the opportunity to take their entitled leave, the employee is eligible
    47	for double compensation for the unused days and retains the right to take those days by the end of the first quarter of the following year.
    48	
    49	Unpaid leave
    50	
    51	On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation. This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must
    52	specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point
    53	of discussion between you and your manager. Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
    54

    56	
    57	You must immediately notify your line manager, within forty-eight (48) hours at the latest, except in cases of force majeure.
    58	
    59	Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.
    60	
    61	Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a by the authorized physician.

    66

    70

    84

   114	on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

   123	##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
   124	answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   125	
   126	Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
   127	and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.
   128	
   129	Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in AOA with the exchange rate by day
   130	the calculation is done.
   131	
   132	Daily allowance is taxable due to Angolan law. Also, you do not have to provide us with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts since it
   133	is not required by Angolan law.
   134	
   135	#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)
   136	
   137	To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
   138	searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
   139	to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
   140	to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot). Also you can find more information
   141	[here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/) ( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel
   142	trip, make report)
   143	
   144	How the business trip process is organized
   145	1. Create a request

   148	2. Wait for approval

   152	
   153	Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
   154	4. Woohoo, you're all set!

   158	
   159	All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports
   160	
   161	## General rules
   162	
   163	Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
   164	business trip:\
   165	- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
   166	- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
   167	- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
   168	- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on

   185	sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.
   186	
   187	Within 3-4 business days after payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can
   188	always raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   189	
   190	#### Taxes and contributions
   191	
   192	The income tax depends on your total income and can be from 18 % to 25%. The income tax is deductible from your income.
   193	
   194	Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to Social fund of 3% from your monthly basic salary.
   195	
   196	#### Reimbursement
   197	
   198	Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
   199	who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.
   200	
   201	To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

   205

   210	
   211	The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
   212	still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   213

   215	
   216	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   217	
   218	#### Who is my HR BP?
   219	
   220	Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

that are not pointed on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves**Annual leave

Each employee is entitled to 22 working days of paid annual leave (public holidays are not included). Employees may take their full 22-day
entitlement at once or split it into multiple periods, provided that each segment lasts at least 6 consecutive working days. All accrued
leave must be used within 2 years of employment.

With mutual agreement between the employer and employee, unused leave can be carried forward for 2--3 years, as long as the employee takes at
least 10 days of vacation annually. If the employer denies an employee the opportunity to take their entitled leave, the employee is eligible
for double compensation for the unused days and retains the right to take those days by the end of the first quarter of the following year.

Unpaid leave

On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation. This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must
specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point
of discussion between you and your manager. Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.

Sick leave

You must immediately notify your line manager, within forty-eight (48) hours at the latest, except in cases of force majeure.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a by the authorized physician.

Other leaves

1 The marriage of the employee (not exceeding 10 calendar days in a row);

2 A day at the time of birth (for fathers);

3 Absences due to the death of family members have the following limits:

8 working days, in case of the death of a spouse or a civil partner or the death of parents and children;

3 working days, in case of the death of grandchildren, uncles, cousins, nephews, sons-in-law and daughters-in-law.

Childcare

If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to
organize childcare leaves.

Maternity leave

A mother has 3 months of rest due to maternity leave.The rest may be extended in case of multiple births or birth of children with
disabilities.

New born leave

An employee has the right, on the occasion of each birth, a day per month up to 12 months of the child. This provision applies in the event
of recognition by the employee of the paternity of a child.

Breastfeeding leave

A mother has the right daily, to leave one hour earlier for breastfeeding.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in AOA with the exchange rate by day
the calculation is done.

Daily allowance is taxable due to Angolan law. Also, you do not have to provide us with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts since it
is not required by Angolan law.

#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot). Also you can find more information
[here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/) ( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel
trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**[As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and
ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**Salary**Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business day, and
sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

Within 3-4 business days after payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can
always raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Taxes and contributions

The income tax depends on your total income and can be from 18 % to 25%. The income tax is deductible from your income.

Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to Social fund of 3% from your monthly basic salary.

#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .

## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |

#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

   159	[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)
   160	
   161	Payroll
   162	
   163	If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   164	
   165	####
   166	
   167	#### Salary
   168	
   169	Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business day, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.
   170	
   171	Within 4 working days after the payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you
   172	can always raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   173	
   174	#### Taxes and contributions
   175	
   176	Cameroonian legislation has a progressive rate of income tax. The rate is from 11 % to 38.5 % and depends on your annual income. The income tax
   177	is deductible from your income.
   178	
   179	Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to CNPS (Social funds) with 1 % of your salary​.
   180	
   181	#### Reimbursement
   182	
   183	Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
   184	who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.
   185	
   186	To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
   187	If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.
   188	
   189	#### How can I update my bank details in systems?
   190	
   191	Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
   192	details.
   193	
   194	#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?
   195	
   196	The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
   197	still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   198	
   199	#### Who is my manager?
   200	
   201	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   202	
   203	#### Who is my HR BP?
   204	
   205	Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   206	
   207	# Benefits in Cameroon
   208	
   209	If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   210	
   211	Medical insurance is provided to full-time Yango employees in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers planned and
   212	emergency medical care services.**Insurance company: Safety Wing**### Insurance rules**\
   213	1.**The policy is updated at the beginning of the insurance period, on
   214	the 1st of January annually.\ You will be notified through the corporate mailing.**2.**Changing the legal entity within the Yango group and subsequent
   215	visa renewal doesn't impact the insurance.**Maximum coverage limit --- \$500 000**##### Consultation and procedures
   216	- Out-patient 2500\$ - 10% copay
   217	- Complementary therapies - 10 sessions (up to 15\$ per visit)\
   218	  --- Massage tharepy\
   219	  --- Osteopaths\
   220	  --- Chiropodists and podiatrists\
   221	  --- Chiropractors\
   222	  --- Homeopaths\
   223	  --- Dieticians\
   224	  --- Acupuncture
   225	
   226	<!-- -->
   227	- 🔎 Check-up and vaccination - 250\$\
   228	  --- Cancer screening\
   229	  --- Cardiovascular and basic vital signs exams\
   230	  --- Basic immunization**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
   231	and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.
   232	
   233	All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
   234	personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
   235	kept confidential.
   236	
   237	### What is OpenUp
   238	
   239	it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
   240	- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
   241	lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
   242	- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
   243	- Self check-in
   244	- Online programs, articles and courses
   245	
   246	How many sessions
   247	
   248	are available?
   249	- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
   250	first language
   251

   253

   255	- How OpenUp [works for
   256	family](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/4.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20family%20%281%29%20%284%29-1.PDF)

   260	Sessions](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DU51I868wppM)

   263	- Quick guide: [Spaces to
   264	OpenUp](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DuAjEcIo4ugE)
   265	- OpenUp [Mobile App
   266	guide](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/OpenUp%20mobile%20app%20%281%29.pdf)
   267	- What can [I contact OpenUp
   268	for?](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/3.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20employees%20%281%29.PDF)
   269	- Interesting [facts](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/7.%20TV-screen%20OpenUp%20%5Bdigiboard%5D%20Did%20you%20know%20facts%20%281%29%20%281%29.PDF) about
   270	your mental well-being
   271	
   272	### How to use your insurance program?**Pay and claim**(1 option)\
   273	Members can pay out of pocket for their visit and then submit a claim for reimbursement via their dashboard. Claims are paid within 3-15
   274	days.\ \**1. Find a provider**\
   275	Choose your preferred provider and book an appointment\ \**2. Request documents**\
   276	Before you finish the consultation, ask your doctor for these docs:\ ﻿﻿- Medical info and treatment plan\
   277	﻿﻿- Prescriptions (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- Test results (if applicable)\
   278	﻿﻿- Itemized invoice and proof of payment\ \**3.Submit a claim***\
   279	Log into your [SafetyWing.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://safetywing.com/) profile
   280	and make a claim! Fill out the quick form and you will receive your reimbursement in 7-10 days.**💵 Direct billing**(2 option)\
   281	- Available for treatments that cost \$250 USD or more.\
   282	- Direct billing request must be notified at least**72 business hours
   283	in advance**. Two weeks notice for pre-planned procedures.\ \**1. Attend first consultation**\
   284	\**2. Gather supporting documents**\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Medical notes with your diagnosis\
   285	﻿﻿- ﻿Exam/lab results and reports (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Treatment plan\
   286	﻿﻿- ﻿Procedure cost estimate\ \**3.Submit a request**\
   287	➡️ Pre-approval\
   288	- Check if something is covered\
   289	- You will pay for the expenses and submit a claim for reimbursement\
   290	\ ➡️ Direct billing\
   291	- Ask the insurance company to pay the provider directly\
   292	- ﻿Available when estimated to be more than US\$250\
   293	- ﻿Can take up to 15 days to be set up, immediately available for
   294	emergencies
   295	
   296	If you have any questions or difficulties please contact the insurance company
   297	
   298	  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Additional financial support**-----------------------------------------------------------------------
   299	
   300	  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
   301	
   302	Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
   303	you financially.
   304	
   305	Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
   306	at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).
   307	
   308	|**Сountry specific bonuses and allowances**|
   309	| --- |
   310	|  |
   311	| Housing allowance\ |
   312	| Transportation allowance |
   313	|  |
   314	| You can find all the details in the Remuneration Policy |
   315	|  |
   316	## Сontacts of International Benefits Team
   317	
   318	Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
   319	If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
   320	<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
   321	confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
   322	wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
   323	the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates
   324	
   325	## Key Points
   326	
   327	#### Payment
   328	
   329	Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.
   330	
   331	We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.
   332	
   333	#### Health insurance
   334	
   335	In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.
   336	
   337	Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
   338	to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.
   339	
   340	Final documentation
   341	
   342	After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.
   343	
   344	Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   345	
   346	#### Workman insurance
   347	
   348	Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.
   349	
   350	Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
   351	to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.
   352	
   353	| #### Resignation ticket |  |
   354	| --- | --- |
   355	|  |  |
   356	| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
   357	| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
   358	|  |  |
   359	| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
   360	| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
   361	|  |  |
   362	| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
   363	| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
   364	|  |  |
   365	| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
   366	#### Expense reports
   367	
   368	You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.
   369	
   370	Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
   371	
   372	We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.
   373	
   374	#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?
   375	
   376	Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
   377	resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.
   378	
   379	#### Who is my manager?
   380	
   381	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   382	
   383	#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?
   384	
   385	If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   386	
   387	#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?
   388	
   389	English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
   390	contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
   391	few days in advance of your resignation date.
   392	
   393	#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?
   394	
   395	Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>
   396	
   397	#### Can I buy company's equipment?
   398	
   399	There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).
   400	
   401	#### Can I get the work certificate?
   402	
   403	Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

topic: Cameroon
-**Cameroon**| Pay date |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
|**Last business day of each month**|  |
Currency**Central African CFA Franc (XAF)**Official language**French**Offices**[RIDETECH CAM SARL](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/3ZfrpWvzm2MEto6H7)**[c. Douala (Hub) 2nd Floor, B'ssadi Galleries, OS2 Immeuble Face Hopital
D'arrondissement de Bonamoussadi DOUALA 5ème]

Public Holidays & Vacation**[12 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)**of
public holidays**18 business days**of annual leave

Employee taxes**Income tax (PAYE):**11 % - 38.5 %​ depending\ on the annual remuneration**Social fund (CNPS):**1 %

Time off - different kind of leaves in Cameroon.

If you have questions regarding time off or you are eligible for some other leaves\
that are not pointed on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 18 calendar days of annual leave, public
holidays are not included.​

You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 18 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split.​

You should take your outstanding vacation days not later than 2 years after employment otherwise it expires 1 year later, i.e. the day before
you leave for the new leave.

Employees must take their leave after 12 months of actual employment. However, in exceptional circumstances and at the employee's request,
leave may be deferred for a maximum period of 2 years. No sanctions for employer if employee do not take vacation.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate
certifying that this leave was granted by the authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by the authorized physician.**Other leaves**According to Cameroonian labour code you have the right for paid leaves
for the following events:
- Marriage -- 3 days.​
- Marriage of a child -- 1 day.
- Childbirth of the employee's wife -- 3 days.
- Death of father, mother, spouse, child -- 3 days.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Please provide information and all the necessary documents to HR admin no later than 1 week before your leave date.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**A mother has maternity leave for 14 weeks.​**You must take your maternity leave 1 month before the birth.**Maternity leave starts 4 weeks before the due date of confinement.

Such leave may be extended by 6 weeks in case of a duly certified illness resulting either from the pregnancy or confinement.**Breastfeeding leave**For a period of 15 months following the birth of the child, a mother has
the right to nursing breaks.

The total duration of the breaks shall not exceed one hour per working day.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diem will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in XAF with the exchange rate by the
date calculation is done.​

Daily allowance is non-taxable due to Cameroonian law, it will be paid with the nearest salary in full.

#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot). Also you can find more information
[here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/) ( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel
trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**#### [As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

your mental well-being

### How to use your insurance program?**Pay and claim**(1 option)\
Members can pay out of pocket for their visit and then submit a claim for reimbursement via their dashboard. Claims are paid within 3-15
days.\ \**1. Find a provider**\
Choose your preferred provider and book an appointment\ \**2. Request documents**\
Before you finish the consultation, ask your doctor for these docs:\ ﻿﻿- Medical info and treatment plan\
﻿﻿- Prescriptions (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- Test results (if applicable)\
﻿﻿- Itemized invoice and proof of payment\ \**3.Submit a claim***\
Log into your [SafetyWing.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://safetywing.com/) profile
and make a claim! Fill out the quick form and you will receive your reimbursement in 7-10 days.**💵 Direct billing**(2 option)\
- Available for treatments that cost \$250 USD or more.\
- Direct billing request must be notified at least**72 business hours
in advance**. Two weeks notice for pre-planned procedures.\ \**1. Attend first consultation**\
\**2. Gather supporting documents**\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Medical notes with your diagnosis\
﻿﻿- ﻿Exam/lab results and reports (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Treatment plan\
﻿﻿- ﻿Procedure cost estimate\ \**3.Submit a request**\
➡️ Pre-approval\
- Check if something is covered\
- You will pay for the expenses and submit a claim for reimbursement\
\ ➡️ Direct billing\
- Ask the insurance company to pay the provider directly\
- ﻿Available when estimated to be more than US\$250\
- ﻿Can take up to 15 days to be set up, immediately available for
emergencies

If you have any questions or difficulties please contact the insurance company

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Additional financial support**-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).

| Housing allowance\ |

## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

topic: Ghana
-**Ghana**| Pay date |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
|**Last business day of each month**|  |
Currency**Ghanaian Cedi  (GHS)**Official languages**English​**HUB offices**[Yango Ghana Limited**](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/GXb3u7UMz1WT7RvX8)

c\. Accra Yango Office 30 independece avenue, GNAT heights

Public Holidays & Vacation**[13 days](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.mint.gov.gh/statutory-public-holidays/)**Statutory
holidays**25 business days**annual leave

| Employee taxes |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
|**Tax on salary (PAYE):**|  |
| [up to 35% of taxable |  |
| income](https://h.yandex-team |  |
| .ru/?https://gra.gov.gh/domestic-tax/tax-types/paye/)​ |  |
|  |  |
|**Social Security\ |  |
| Contribution (Employee):**5.5% |  |
|  |  |
|**Provident Fund (optional):**up to 16.5% |  |**Key Contacts****Sonia Timana**[HR Manager](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/sonia-timana)

Onboarding, bank, visa issues, termination, payroll, insurance, HR Policy formulation and administration**Abigail Omari-Boamah**[Office Manager](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/abigail)

Access cards, parking, facilities and office management**\ Joshua Adi**[Local HR Admin](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/joshuaadi)**Time off**different kind of leaves in Ghana

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 25 business of annual leave. Public
holidays are not included.

You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 25 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split.

In case of splitting, a fraction must be at least ten (10) consecutive days.

It is possible to carryover vacation to the future periods. As long as the vacation days accrued by the employee are paid at the exit of the
employee, no penalties/sanctions exist.**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate certifying that this leave was granted by an authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (excuse duty) issued by the authorized physician.

  -----------------------------------
        Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of
        the company.
  -- -- -----------------------------

  -----------------------------------

|**Compassionate leave**|
| --- |
|  |
|**When compassionate leave may be available:**|
|  |
| 1. Employees may take compassionate leave of up to 14 days where a |
| close relative has died, is critically ill with a |
| life-threatening illness, or has suffered a life-threatening |
| injury. ​ |
|  |
| 2. In the event of the death of a child, including a stillbirth, we |
| may grant further compassionate leave in this situation at our |
| discretion. ​ |
|  |
| 3. In the case o other traumatic events or difficult personal |
| circumstances on a case-by-case basis. ​ |
|  |
| 4. If an employee cannot return to work following compassionate |
| leave, the employee should contact the line manager OR the Human |
| Resources Department. At its discretion, management may grant |
| further compassionate leave in those circumstances. |
| Alternatively, the employee may be able to take a period of |
| annual leave, subject to the manager's approval.​ |
|**Requesting compassionate leave:**|
|  |
| 1.**We recognise that requesting compassionate leave in advance may |
| not always be possible. However, where it is possible, employees |
| should make a request to the line manager or the Human Resources |
| Manager. The request must clarify the reasons for the intended |
| leave and the number of leave days.​**|
|  |
| 2.**Where it is impossible to request leave in advance, you should |
| contact your line manager as soon as possible to tell them why |
| and how many days you expect to be absent. Someone can do this on |
| your behalf if necessary.​**|**Maternity policies**If this is a current case and you need to take this type of time off,
please raise ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize leaves.**Antenatal leave**A pregnant employee may take reasonable paid time off during working
hours for antenatal appointments. This may include any parenting classes the doctor, midwife or health visitor has advised. The pregnant employee
should try to give as much notice as possible of the appointment.**Maternity leave**All female employees are entitled to a maximum of 12 weeks of maternity leave.
1. The earliest an expectant employee can start maternity leave is six
    weeks before the Expected Week of Childbirth (unless the child is born prematurely before that date).
2. If the expectant employee wants to change the Intended Start Date,
    please inform the HR Department in writing. The employee should give as much notice as possible, but wherever possible, must notify the
    HR Department at least 28 days before the original Intended Start Date (or the new start date if you are bringing the date forward).
3. Shortly before the maternity leave is due to start, we will discuss
    with the employee the arrangements for covering work and the opportunities for the employee to remain in contact, should they
    wish to do so, during the leave.
4. Upon resumption from the maternity leave, the nursing mother shall
    be entitled to one-hour breastfeeding break, to be selected by the employee. This breakshall be in effect until the first birthday of
    the baby.

|**ime-off for accompanying a pregnant woman**|
| --- |
|  |
|**Eligibility**|
|  |
| An employee may take time off to accompany a pregnant woman to an |
| antenatal appointment if he has a «qualifying relationship» with the |
| woman or the child. This means that either: |
|  |
| 1. You are the baby's father;​ |
|  |
| 2. You are the pregnant woman's spouse OR are living with her in an |
| enduring family relationship, and she is not your sister, mother, |
| grandmother, aunt or niece;​ |
|  |
| 3. You are one of the intended parents in a surrogacy arrangement |
| and expect to obtain a parental order regarding the child.​ |**How to book**Employees are required to give as much notice of the appointment as
possible. You must provide a signed statement indicating the date and time of the appointment and confirming the following:
1. That he meets one of the eligibility criteria.​
2. That the purpose of the time off is to accompany the pregnant woman
    to an antenatal appointment;​
3. The appointment has been made on the advice of a registered medical
    practitioner, registered midwife or registered nurse.

#### *Who is my manager?*

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *How can I get access to Absence Planner?*

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.*

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### *What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?*

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### *Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?*

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### *Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?*

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in GHS with the exchange rate as of
approximately 20th of the month of payment.​

Please note that all allowances are taxable due to Ghanaian tax law.

#### [*[Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate]*](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

> Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

> Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

> Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

> Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel > considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

> All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**[As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and
ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### *Hotline*

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team
 <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
|  | *Salary* |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Salary payment is once a month. It is paid on the last |  |
|  | business day of the month, and sometimes can be paid a couple of |  |
|  | days earlier, but not later than 8 days after the end of the |  |
|  | month. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | On the day of payment, you will receive a pay-slip with a |  |
|  | payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received |  |
|  | amounts, you can always raise your question via question |  |
|  | via [H |  |
|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
| +==================================================================+ |
| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
#### *Reimbursment*

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### *Taxes and contributions*

The company will with hold, as applicable, income taxes and other statutory deductions as may be required and declare them to the relevant
tax administration, in accordance with the tax regulations in force in Ghana.

Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to Social Security and National Insurance Trust.

A general overview of Taxes and contribution:
- Tax on salary (PAYE) -- up to 35% of taxable income
- Social Security Contribution (Employee) -- 5.5%
- Social Security Contribution (Employer) -- 13%
- Provident Fund (optional) -- up to 16.5%

#### *How can I update my bank details in systems?*

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### *How was my KPI bonus calculated?*

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### *Who is my manager?*

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *Who is my HR BP?*

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

# Benefits  in Ghana

# If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team  <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Health insurance is provided to Yango employees by the Company's decision. Health insurance covers the services of planned and emergency
medical care.

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Insurance program**---------------------------------------------------------------- ------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
- Members are required to use accredited AHI Health Services Providers.
- Members are required to present their health insurance card to access
  medical services at any of the AHI Health Services Providers.
- Members are not to pay cash for any service rendered by an accredited
  AHI Health Service Provider unless the member has exceeded the benefit limit or medication and service fall within an exclusion.
- AHI does not operate with a drug list. Medications are served based on
  policy benefits.
- A pre-authorization is required for procedures if the doctor's
  referral falls outside the scope of AHI Service Providers.**[Log Into Application]**5. Enter membership 1st 11 digits of you membership number;
6. After, click login button to enter application;
7. Verification token will be sent to your phone through SMS;
8. After, click confirm button to get verified.**[Your relationship manager]****[ ]****0596921844 (Helpline)\****0201322103 (WhatsApp)**If you have got any questions, please contact the Insurance company or
create a [task](https://st.yandex-team.ru/createTicket?queue=INTCOMP).

|****|

|**Additional financial support**|
|  |
Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. [Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).]******Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

[Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .]

| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |
|  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved by your |
| manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |
|  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in Angola is |
| 30 calendar days. |
|  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |
#### *Expense reports*

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### *How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?*

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### *Who is my manager?*

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *Is this possible to receive a reference letter?*

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### *Can I receive a Job certificate in English?*

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### *How can I contact HR after the termination date?*

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### *Can I buy company's equipment?*

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### *Can I get the work certificate?*

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to:
- 12  calendar days in the first year of work;
- 30 calendar days for the second and more years of work.

The duration of each vacation cannot be less than 6 calendar days.

If there is an agreement between both parties, it is admissible to accumulate days of vacation, up to 60 days.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate
certifying that this leave was granted by the authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list). It will be paid by Social Security System and only if the sick leave
more than 4 days (first 3 days are not paid by Social Security).**Other leaves**According to labour legislation of Mozambique you have the right for paid leaves for the following events:
- 5 days due to marriage
- 5 days due to the death of the employee's spouse, partner or de facto
  partner, father, mother, children, stepchildren, siblings, grandparents, grandchildren, stepfather, stepmother, parents-in-law,
  sons-in-law and daughters-in-law;
- 2 days due to the death of uncles, cousins, nephews, grandchildren and
  brothers-in- law;

> ​

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            You will need to provide information and all the necessary documents upon request of HR admin.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**A female employee has 90 calendar days, 20 days can be taken before
delivery date.

Maternity leave is paid by the National Institute of Social Security.**Paternity leave**Male employees are entitled to 7 days paternity leave, starting on the day following the birth of the child.

The employee can't enjoy paternity leave within a period of 18 months after the previous leave is taken.

Paternity leave is granted for 60 days in cases of death  or incapacity of the mother, when proven by a competent health entity.**\
Breastfeeding leave**The female employee has the right to interrupt her daily work schedule in order to breast-feed the child in two periods of half an hour each or
one period of one hour according to her preference and with the agreement of her supervisor, without loss of remuneration, for a period
of one year.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

In Mozambique to have the refund of all the expenses done related to the business trip, it is necessary to apply in the Expensify platform all
the tickets, in case the business trip is out of the country.

To have the correct application to get in the platform please contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot),
that can help you with all the registration process in the correct entity.​

#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**#### [As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

# Benefits in Mozambique

# If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
  Medical insurance is provided to full-time Yango employees in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers
  planned and emergency medical care services.

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Insurance Company Safety Wing

### Insurance rules**\
1.**The policy is updated at the beginning of the insurance period, on
the 1st of January annually.\ You will be notified through the corporate mailing.**2.**Changing the legal entity within the Yango group and subsequent
visa renewal doesn't impact the insurance.**Maximum coverage limit --- \$500 000**##### Consultation and procedures
- Out-patient 2500\$ - 10% copay
- 👨‍⚕️ Complementary therapies - 10 sessions (up to 15\$ per visit)\
