  --- Necessary costs for pregnancy and child birth\
  --- Pre and post natal check-ups for up to 30 days following
  discharge\
  --- 10-month waiting period**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.

lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access

first language

### How to use your insurance program?**Pay and claim**(1 option)\
Members can pay out of pocket for their visit and then submit a claim for reimbursement via their dashboard. Claims are paid within 3-15
days.\ \**1. Find a provider**\
Choose your preferred provider and book an appointment\ \**2. Request documents**\
Before you finish the consultation, ask your doctor for these docs:\ ﻿﻿- Medical info and treatment plan\
﻿﻿- Prescriptions (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- Test results (if applicable)\
﻿﻿- Itemized invoice and proof of payment\ \**3.Submit a claim***\
Log into your [SafetyWing.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://safetywing.com/) profile
and make a claim! Fill out the quick form and you will receive your reimbursement in 7-10 days.**💵 Direct billing**(2 option)\
- Available for treatments that cost \$250 USD or more.\
- Direct billing request must be notified at least**72 business hours
in advance**. Two weeks notice for pre-planned procedures.\ \**1. Attend first consultation**\
\**2. Gather supporting documents**\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Medical notes with your diagnosis\
﻿﻿- ﻿Exam/lab results and reports (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Treatment plan\
﻿﻿- ﻿Procedure cost estimate\ \**3.Submit a request**\
➡️ Pre-approval\
- Check if something is covered\
- You will pay for the expenses and submit a claim for reimbursement\
\ ➡️ Direct billing\
- Ask the insurance company to pay the provider directly\
- ﻿Available when estimated to be more than US\$250\
- ﻿Can take up to 15 days to be set up, immediately available for
emergencies

If you have any questions or difficulties please contact the insurance company

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Additional financial support**-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).

## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

   127	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   128	
   129	#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?
   130	
   131	Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).
   132	
   133	#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.
   134	
   135	Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
   136	your absence and the better way to fill this absence.
   137	
   138	#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?
   139	
   140	This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.
   141	
   142	#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?
   143	
   144	Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
   145	on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.
   146	
   147	#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?
   148	
   149	You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.
   150	
   151	You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
   152	you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.
   153	
   154	##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
   155	answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   156	
   157	Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
   158	and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.
   159	
   160	Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in XOF with the exchange rate as of
   161	approximately 20th of the month of payment.
   162	
   163	#### [Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)
   164	
   165	To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
   166	searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
   167	to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
   168	to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).
   169	
   170	Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
   171	( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)
   172	
   173	How the business trip process is organized
   174	1. Create a request
   175	
   176	Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
   177	2. Wait for approval
   178	
   179	Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
   180	3. Book travel and accommodation
   181	
   182	Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
   183	4. Woohoo, you're all set!
   184	
   185	Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
   186	5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy
   187	
   188	All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports
   189	
   190	## General rules
   191	
   192	Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
   193	business trip:\
   194	- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
   195	- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
   196	- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
   197	- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
   198	availability of visa slots).
   199	
   200	Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**#### [As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]
   201	
   202	#### Hotline
   203	
   204	Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct
   205	
   206	[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)
   207	
   208	[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)
   209	
   210	Payroll
   211	
   212	If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   213	
   214	#### Salary
   215	
   216	Salary payment is once a month, it is paid on the 25th of  the month, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days later if the 25th falls on a
   217	weekend.
   218	
   219	On the day of payment, you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can always
   220	raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   221	
   222	#### Taxes and contributions
   223	
   224	The company will withhold, as applicable, income taxes and other statutory deductions as may be required and declare them to the relevant
   225	tax administration, in accordance with the tax regulations in force in Cote d'Ivoire.
   226	
   227	Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to CNPS (Pension funds) and CMU (National Medical Insurance)
   228	
   229	#### Reimbursment
   230	
   231	Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
   232	who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.
   233	
   234	To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
   235	If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.
   236	
   237	#### How can I update my bank details in systems?
   238	
   239	Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
   240	details.
   241	
   242	#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?
   243	
   244	The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
   245	still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   246	
   247	#### Who is my manager?
   248	
   249	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   250	
   251	#### Who is my HR BP?
   252	
   253	Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   254	
   255	# Benefits in Côte d'Ivoire
   256	
   257	If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   258	
   259	Medical insurance is provided to full-time Yango employees in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers planned and
   260	emergency medical care services.**Insurance company: Comar Assuranges****Insurance program****The medical insurance includes:**- Consultation (General Practitioner and Specialist);

   382	|**Additional financial support**|
   383	|  |
   384	Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
   385	you financially.
   386	
   387	Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
   388	at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
   389	and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.
   390	
   391	All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
   392	personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
   393	kept confidential.
   394	
   395	### What is OpenUp
   396	
   397	it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
   398	- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
   399	lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
   400	- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
   401	- Self check-in
   402	- Online programs, articles and courses
   403	
   404	How many sessions
   405	
   406	are available?
   407	- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
   408	first language
   409	
   410	Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .

   428	your mental well-being

   438	## Сontacts of International Benefits Team
   439	
   440	Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
   441	If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
   442	<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
   443	confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
   444	wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
   445	the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates
   446	
   447	## Key Points
   448	
   449	#### Payment
   450	
   451	Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.
   452	
   453	We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.
   454	
   455	#### Health insurance
   456	
   457	In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.
   458	
   459	Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
   460	to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.
   461	
   462	Final documentation
   463	
   464	After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.
   465	
   466	Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   467	
   468	#### Workman insurance
   469	
   470	Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.
   471	
   472	Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
   473	to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.
   474	
   475	| #### Resignation ticket |  |
   476	| --- | --- |
   477	|  |  |
   478	| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
   479	| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
   480	|  |  |
   481	| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
   482	| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
   483	|  |  |
   484	| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
   485	| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
   486	|  |  |
   487	| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
   488	#### Expense reports
   489	
   490	You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.
   491	
   492	Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
   493	
   494	We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.
   495	
   496	#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?
   497	
   498	Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
   499	resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.
   500	
   501	#### Who is my manager?
   502	
   503	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
   504	
   505	#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?
   506	
   507	If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).
   508	
   509	#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?
   510	
   511	English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
   512	contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
   513	few days in advance of your resignation date.
   514	
   515	#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?
   516	
   517	Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>
   518	
   519	#### Can I buy company's equipment?
   520	
   521	There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).
   522	
   523	#### Can I get the work certificate?
   524	
   525	Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.
   526

06 BP 534 Abdijan 06]

Public Holidays & Vacation**[14 days**](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)public
holidays**26 business days**annual leave

Employee taxes

A general overview of Taxes and contribution**Tax on salary (IS):**1,20%**National contribution (CN):**up 10%**General income tax (IGR):**up 10%**Pension plan (CNPS):**6,3%**CMU contribution:**500 XOF/ employee & dependent**Key Contacts****\ Sonia Timana**[HR Manager](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/sonia-timana)

Onboarding, bank, visa issues, termination**Vanessa Meresso Yao**[Office Manager](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/meressoyao)

Access cards, parking, any office requests**Stéphane Vagba**[HR Administrator](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/stephvagba)

Hiring, termination, payroll, salary certificates, insurance**Aida Coulibaly-Diakite**[Accountant](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/aidacoulibaly)

Payroll, expenses reimbursement**Idrissa Diarrasouba**[IT Support](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/idiarras)

IT assets, printers**Mohamed Sekongo**[HR Administrator](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/mohamedsekong)

Hiring, termination, payroll, salary certificates, insurance**Time off**different kind of leaves in Cote d'Ivoire.

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 26 business days of annual leave, public
holidays are not included.

You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 26 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split.

In case of splitting, a fraction must be at least fourteen (14) consecutive days, between two weekly rest days.

Annual leave is increased by:
- 1 additional day of leave after 5 years of seniority in the company
- 2 additional days of leave after 10 years
- 3 additional days of leave after 15 years
- 5 additional days of leave after 20 years
- 7 additional days of leave after 25 years
- 8 additional days of leave after 30 years

It is possible to carryover vacation to the future periods. No penalties/sanctions exist.**Exceptional Leave**Employees who have been with the company for at least six (6) months and
who are affected by family events, duly justified, listed below shall be granted exceptional leave, within the limit of 10 working days per
year, which shall not be deducted from the legal leave and shall not entail any deduction of salary.
- Wedding of an employee --- 4 days
- Wedding of an employee's child, brother, sister --- 2 days
- Death of Wife/Husband, Child, Father, Mother of an employee --- 5 days
- Death of Brother, Sister of an employee --- 2 days
- Birth of a child --- 2 days
- Baptism of a child --- 2 days
- First Holy Communion --- 1 day
- Moving house --- 1 day

| -**Sick leave**|

| authorized physician. |
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  -------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take this vacation, please
raise ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.

| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
|  |**Maternity leave**|  |
|  |  |  |
|  | A mother has 14 consecutive weeks of rest due to maternity |  |
|  | leave, which can be distributed in two stages: |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - 6 weeks of pre-natal rest |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - 8 weeks of post-natal rest |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | The request for maternity leave must be supported by a medical |  |
|  | certificate indicating the approximate date of delivery. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | The rest may be extended by three (3) weeks in the event |  |
|  | of illness duly certified by a health specialist, resulting from |  |
|  | the pregnancy or childbirth. |  |
| +==================================================================+ |
| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |**Breastfeeding leave**During the breastfeeding period, which lasts 15 months from the birth
of the child, a mother has a leave of one hour per day within the working day, which is counted as one hour worked, for breastfeeding
purpose.

The time for breastfeeding is determined by agreement between the interested parties and the employer. In the absence of an agreement,
it is placed in the middle of each half-day of work.

This is the mandatory benefit, and a mother cannot cease from this benefit, nor compensate or substitute it.

|  | of their child. It is granted 2 days of paid leave, it cannot |  |
|  | be waived or substituted. |  |

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in XOF with the exchange rate as of
approximately 20th of the month of payment.

#### [Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**#### [As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

#### Salary

Salary payment is once a month, it is paid on the 25th of  the month, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days later if the 25th falls on a
weekend.

On the day of payment, you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can always
raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Taxes and contributions

The company will withhold, as applicable, income taxes and other statutory deductions as may be required and declare them to the relevant
tax administration, in accordance with the tax regulations in force in Cote d'Ivoire.

Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to CNPS (Pension funds) and CMU (National Medical Insurance)

#### Reimbursment

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

# Benefits in Côte d'Ivoire

If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Medical insurance is provided to full-time Yango employees in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers planned and
emergency medical care services.**Insurance company: Comar Assuranges****Insurance program****The medical insurance includes:**- Consultation (General Practitioner and Specialist);
- Hospitalization (Medical and Surgical);
- Laboratory analyses, medical imaging;
- Dentistry;
- The optics;
- The pharmacy;
- Maternity, childbirth (Normal or Surgical) and emergency medical
  transport and more.

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .

## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

topic: Angola
-**Angola\**\
Pay date- last business day of each month.

Currency - Angolan Kwanzas (Kz/AOA).

Official language -- Portuguese.

#### Offices-**[RIDETECH -- TRANSPORTES E TECNOLOGIAS, LDA](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/avoBuLPMCDuzqyfd8)**[c. Condomínio Florença, Casa Nº 5\
Av. Luanda Sul\ Talatona\
Luanda, Angola]

Public Holidays & Vacation- [12 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/) of
public holidays and 22 business days of annual leave.**1 January**--- New Year's Day**4 February**--- Day of the Armed Struggle**12 February**--- Carnival Holiday**13 February**--- Carnival**8 March**--- International Women's Day**23 March**--- Southern Africa Liberation Day**29 March**--- Good Friday**4 April**--- Angolan Peace Day**5 April**--- Angolan Peace Day Holiday**1 May**--- Labour Day**16 September**--- National Heroes Day Holiday**17 September**--- National Heroes Day**2 November**--- All Souls' Day**11 November**--- Independence Day**25 December**--- Christmas Day

Employee taxes - Income tax (IRT) from 18 % to 25 % depending on the annual remuneration. Social contributions: 3 %

Time off - different kind of leaves in Angola.

If you have questions regarding time off or you are eligible for some other leaves\
that are not pointed on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves**Annual leave

Each employee is entitled to 22 working days of paid annual leave (public holidays are not included). Employees may take their full 22-day
entitlement at once or split it into multiple periods, provided that each segment lasts at least 6 consecutive working days. All accrued
leave must be used within 2 years of employment.

With mutual agreement between the employer and employee, unused leave can be carried forward for 2--3 years, as long as the employee takes at
least 10 days of vacation annually. If the employer denies an employee the opportunity to take their entitled leave, the employee is eligible
for double compensation for the unused days and retains the right to take those days by the end of the first quarter of the following year.

Unpaid leave

On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation. This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must
specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point
of discussion between you and your manager. Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.

Sick leave

You must immediately notify your line manager, within forty-eight (48) hours at the latest, except in cases of force majeure.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a by the authorized physician.

Other leaves

1 The marriage of the employee (not exceeding 10 calendar days in a row);

2 A day at the time of birth (for fathers);

3 Absences due to the death of family members have the following limits:

8 working days, in case of the death of a spouse or a civil partner or the death of parents and children;

3 working days, in case of the death of grandchildren, uncles, cousins, nephews, sons-in-law and daughters-in-law.

Childcare

If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to
organize childcare leaves.

Maternity leave

A mother has 3 months of rest due to maternity leave.The rest may be extended in case of multiple births or birth of children with
disabilities.

New born leave

An employee has the right, on the occasion of each birth, a day per month up to 12 months of the child. This provision applies in the event
of recognition by the employee of the paternity of a child.

Breastfeeding leave

A mother has the right daily, to leave one hour earlier for breastfeeding.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in AOA with the exchange rate by day
the calculation is done.

Daily allowance is taxable due to Angolan law. Also, you do not have to provide us with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts since it
is not required by Angolan law.

#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot). Also you can find more information
[here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/) ( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel
trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**[As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and
ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**Salary**Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business day, and
sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

Within 3-4 business days after payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can
always raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Taxes and contributions

The income tax depends on your total income and can be from 18 % to 25%. The income tax is deductible from your income.

Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to Social fund of 3% from your monthly basic salary.

#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

# Benefits in Angola

If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**Medical insurance**|**Insurance company: NOSSA**|
| --- |
|  |
|**About health insurance**|
|  |
| Health insurance is provided to Yango employees by the Company's |
| decision. Health insurance covers the services of planned and |
| emergency medical care. |
|  |
|**Insurance program**|
|  |
|**The medical insurance includes:**|
|  |
| - Consultation (General Practitioner and Specialist); |
|  |
| - Hospitalization (Medical and Surgical); |
|  |
| - Laboratory analyses, medical imaging; |
|  |
| - Dentistry; |
|  |
| - The optics; |
|  |
| - The pharmacy; |
|  |
| - Maternity, childbirth (Normal or Surgical) and emergency medical |
| transport and more. |
|  |
| [APRESENTAÇÃO PRODUTO SAÚDE - |

|  |
|**When you can start using health insurance**|
|  |
| All employees will be insured within the first month from the start |
| of employment. A letter will be sent to the email indicating the |
| start date of the health insurance. |
|  |
| You can contact the clinics immediately after receiving the policy, |
| you must have a photo document with you (passport, driver's |
| license). |
|  |
| When an employee is dismissed from the company, the insurance is |
| terminated on the next calendar day after the dismissal. |
|  |
|**Contacts**|
|  |
| If you have got any questions, please contact the Insurance company |
| or create |
| a [task](https://st.yandex-team.ru/createTicket?queue=INTCOMP). |
|  |
|**Additional financial support**|
|  |
Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .

family](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/4.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20family%20%281%29%20%284%29-1.PDF)

your mental well-being

## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

1.**The policy is updated at the beginning of the insurance period, on
the 1st of January annually.\ You will be notified through the corporate mailing.**2.**Changing the legal entity within the Yango group and subsequent
visa renewal doesn't impact the insurance.**Maximum coverage limit --- \$500 000**##### Consultation and procedures
- Out-patient 2500\$ - 10% copay
- Complementary therapies - 10 sessions (up to 15\$ per visit)\
  --- Massage tharepy\
  --- Osteopaths\
  --- Chiropodists and podiatrists\
  --- Chiropractors\
  --- Homeopaths\
  --- Dieticians\
  --- Acupuncture

<!-- -->
- 🔎 Check-up and vaccination - 250\$\
  --- Cancer screening\
  --- Cardiovascular and basic vital signs exams\
  --- Basic immunization**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

[Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .]

### Useful links
- How OpenUp [works for
family](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/4.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20family%20%281%29%20%284%29-1.PDF)
- Quick guide: [Welcome to
OpenUp](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DN1jYEP1fgRQ)

Sessions](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DU51I868wppM)
- Quick
guide: [Courses](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DSIHkHLSVu-E)
- Quick guide: [Spaces to
OpenUp](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DuAjEcIo4ugE)

guide](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/OpenUp%20mobile%20app%20%281%29.pdf)
- What can [I contact OpenUp
for?](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/3.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20employees%20%281%29.PDF)
- Interesting [facts](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/7.%20TV-screen%20OpenUp%20%5Bdigiboard%5D%20Did%20you%20know%20facts%20%281%29%20%281%29.PDF) about
your mental well-being

### How to use your insurance program?**Pay and claim**(1 option)\
Members can pay out of pocket for their visit and then submit a claim for reimbursement via their dashboard. Claims are paid within 3-15
days.\ \**1. Find a provider**\
Choose your preferred provider and book an appointment\ \**2. Request documents**\
Before you finish the consultation, ask your doctor for these docs:\ ﻿﻿- Medical info and treatment plan\
﻿﻿- Prescriptions (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- Test results (if applicable)\
﻿﻿- Itemized invoice and proof of payment\ \**3.Submit a claim***\
Log into your [SafetyWing.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://safetywing.com/) profile
and make a claim! Fill out the quick form and you will receive your reimbursement in 7-10 days.**💵 Direct billing**(2 option)\
- Available for treatments that cost \$250 USD or more.\
- Direct billing request must be notified at least**72 business hours
in advance**. Two weeks notice for pre-planned procedures.\ \**1. Attend first consultation**\
\**2. Gather supporting documents**\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Medical notes with your diagnosis\
﻿﻿- ﻿Exam/lab results and reports (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- ﻿Treatment plan\
﻿﻿- ﻿Procedure cost estimate\ \**3.Submit a request**\
➡️ Pre-approval\
- Check if something is covered\
- You will pay for the expenses and submit a claim for reimbursement\
\ ➡️ Direct billing\
- Ask the insurance company to pay the provider directly\
- ﻿Available when estimated to be more than US\$250\
- ﻿Can take up to 15 days to be set up, immediately available for
emergencies

If you have any questions or difficulties please contact the insurance company

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Additional financial support**-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).

|**Сountry specific bonuses and allowances**|

|  |
| Housing allowance\ |
| Transportation allowance |
|  |
| You can find all the details in the Remuneration Policy |
|  |
## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

Access cards, parking, facilities and office management**\ Joshua Adi**[Local HR Admin](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/joshuaadi)**Time off**different kind of leaves in Ghana

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 25 business of annual leave. Public
holidays are not included.

You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 25 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split.

In case of splitting, a fraction must be at least ten (10) consecutive days.

It is possible to carryover vacation to the future periods. As long as the vacation days accrued by the employee are paid at the exit of the
employee, no penalties/sanctions exist.**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate certifying that this leave was granted by an authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (excuse duty) issued by the authorized physician.

  -----------------------------------
        Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of
        the company.
  -- -- -----------------------------

  -----------------------------------

|**Compassionate leave**|
| --- |
|  |
|**When compassionate leave may be available:**|
|  |
| 1. Employees may take compassionate leave of up to 14 days where a |
| close relative has died, is critically ill with a |
| life-threatening illness, or has suffered a life-threatening |
| injury. ​ |
|  |
| 2. In the event of the death of a child, including a stillbirth, we |
| may grant further compassionate leave in this situation at our |
| discretion. ​ |
|  |
| 3. In the case o other traumatic events or difficult personal |
| circumstances on a case-by-case basis. ​ |
|  |
| 4. If an employee cannot return to work following compassionate |
| leave, the employee should contact the line manager OR the Human |
| Resources Department. At its discretion, management may grant |
| further compassionate leave in those circumstances. |
| Alternatively, the employee may be able to take a period of |
| annual leave, subject to the manager's approval.​ |
|**Requesting compassionate leave:**|
|  |
| 1.**We recognise that requesting compassionate leave in advance may |
| not always be possible. However, where it is possible, employees |
| should make a request to the line manager or the Human Resources |
| Manager. The request must clarify the reasons for the intended |
| leave and the number of leave days.​**|
|  |
| 2.**Where it is impossible to request leave in advance, you should |
| contact your line manager as soon as possible to tell them why |
| and how many days you expect to be absent. Someone can do this on |
| your behalf if necessary.​**|**Maternity policies**If this is a current case and you need to take this type of time off,
please raise ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize leaves.**Antenatal leave**A pregnant employee may take reasonable paid time off during working
hours for antenatal appointments. This may include any parenting classes the doctor, midwife or health visitor has advised. The pregnant employee
should try to give as much notice as possible of the appointment.**Maternity leave**All female employees are entitled to a maximum of 12 weeks of maternity leave.
1. The earliest an expectant employee can start maternity leave is six
    weeks before the Expected Week of Childbirth (unless the child is born prematurely before that date).
2. If the expectant employee wants to change the Intended Start Date,
    please inform the HR Department in writing. The employee should give as much notice as possible, but wherever possible, must notify the
    HR Department at least 28 days before the original Intended Start Date (or the new start date if you are bringing the date forward).
3. Shortly before the maternity leave is due to start, we will discuss
    with the employee the arrangements for covering work and the opportunities for the employee to remain in contact, should they
    wish to do so, during the leave.
4. Upon resumption from the maternity leave, the nursing mother shall
    be entitled to one-hour breastfeeding break, to be selected by the employee. This breakshall be in effect until the first birthday of
    the baby.

|**ime-off for accompanying a pregnant woman**|
| --- |
|  |
|**Eligibility**|
|  |
| An employee may take time off to accompany a pregnant woman to an |
| antenatal appointment if he has a «qualifying relationship» with the |
| woman or the child. This means that either: |
|  |
| 1. You are the baby's father;​ |
|  |
| 2. You are the pregnant woman's spouse OR are living with her in an |
| enduring family relationship, and she is not your sister, mother, |
| grandmother, aunt or niece;​ |
|  |
| 3. You are one of the intended parents in a surrogacy arrangement |
| and expect to obtain a parental order regarding the child.​ |**How to book**Employees are required to give as much notice of the appointment as
possible. You must provide a signed statement indicating the date and time of the appointment and confirming the following:
1. That he meets one of the eligibility criteria.​
2. That the purpose of the time off is to accompany the pregnant woman
    to an antenatal appointment;​
3. The appointment has been made on the advice of a registered medical
    practitioner, registered midwife or registered nurse.

#### *Who is my manager?*

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *How can I get access to Absence Planner?*

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.*

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### *What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?*

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### *Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?*

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### *Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?*

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in GHS with the exchange rate as of
approximately 20th of the month of payment.​

Please note that all allowances are taxable due to Ghanaian tax law.

#### [*[Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate]*](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)

#### *Reimbursment*

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

#### *Taxes and contributions*

The company will with hold, as applicable, income taxes and other statutory deductions as may be required and declare them to the relevant
tax administration, in accordance with the tax regulations in force in Ghana.

Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to Social Security and National Insurance Trust.

A general overview of Taxes and contribution:
- Tax on salary (PAYE) -- up to 35% of taxable income
- Social Security Contribution (Employee) -- 5.5%
- Social Security Contribution (Employer) -- 13%
- Provident Fund (optional) -- up to 16.5%
