guide](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/OpenUp%20mobile%20app%20%281%29.pdf)
- What can [I contact OpenUp
for?](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/3.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20employees%20%281%29.PDF)
- Interesting [facts](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/7.%20TV-screen%20OpenUp%20%5Bdigiboard%5D%20Did%20you%20know%20facts%20%281%29%20%281%29.PDF) about
your mental well-being********|**Сountry specific bonuses and allowances**|
| --- |
|  |
| Transport allowance\ |
| Christmas bonus\ |
| Seniority bonus |
|  |
| You can find all the details in the Remuneration Policy |********## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### *Payment*

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### *Health insurance*

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### *Workman insurance*

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| *Resignation ticket* |
| --- |
|  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |
|  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved by your |
| manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |
|  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in Angola is |
| 30 calendar days. |
|  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |
#### *Expense reports*

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### *How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?*

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### *Who is my manager?*

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### *Is this possible to receive a reference letter?*

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### *Can I receive a Job certificate in English?*

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### *How can I contact HR after the termination date?*

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### *Can I buy company's equipment?*

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### *Can I get the work certificate?*

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

# Region: Africa, Country: Mozambique

Employee information and policies for Yango employees in Mozambique including payroll, benefits, time off, travel, and offboarding procedures.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: Africa topic: Mozambique
---

topic: Mozambique
-**Mozambique**Pay date**Last business day of each month**Currency**Mozambican metical (MZN)**Official languages**Portuguese**Offices**[Ridetech MOZ,
SAS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/CDmTzcAcjGAwH9M78)**Cowork Lab 7, Av. Maginal Nr. 9149A, 1st floor

Public Holidays & Vacation**[9 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)**of
public holidays**12 or 30 days**of annual leave depending on seniority

Employee taxes**Income tax**from 10 % to 32  % depending on the annual remuneration**Social security contributions**3 %**Time off**different kind of leaves in Mozambique

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to:
- 12  calendar days in the first year of work;
- 30 calendar days for the second and more years of work.

The duration of each vacation cannot be less than 6 calendar days.

If there is an agreement between both parties, it is admissible to accumulate days of vacation, up to 60 days.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate
certifying that this leave was granted by the authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list). It will be paid by Social Security System and only if the sick leave
more than 4 days (first 3 days are not paid by Social Security).**Other leaves**According to labour legislation of Mozambique you have the right for paid leaves for the following events:
- 5 days due to marriage
- 5 days due to the death of the employee's spouse, partner or de facto
  partner, father, mother, children, stepchildren, siblings, grandparents, grandchildren, stepfather, stepmother, parents-in-law,
  sons-in-law and daughters-in-law;
- 2 days due to the death of uncles, cousins, nephews, grandchildren and
  brothers-in- law;

> ​

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            You will need to provide information and all the necessary documents upon request of HR admin.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**A female employee has 90 calendar days, 20 days can be taken before
delivery date.

Maternity leave is paid by the National Institute of Social Security.**Paternity leave**Male employees are entitled to 7 days paternity leave, starting on the day following the birth of the child.

The employee can't enjoy paternity leave within a period of 18 months after the previous leave is taken.

Paternity leave is granted for 60 days in cases of death  or incapacity of the mother, when proven by a competent health entity.**\
Breastfeeding leave**The female employee has the right to interrupt her daily work schedule in order to breast-feed the child in two periods of half an hour each or
one period of one hour according to her preference and with the agreement of her supervisor, without loss of remuneration, for a period
of one year.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

In Mozambique to have the refund of all the expenses done related to the business trip, it is necessary to apply in the Expensify platform all
the tickets, in case the business trip is out of the country.

To have the correct application to get in the platform please contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot),
that can help you with all the registration process in the correct entity.​

#### [ Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**#### [As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
|  | #### Salary |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business |  |
|  | day, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | At the day of payment you will receive a payslip with a payment |  |
|  | breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can |  |
|  | always raise your question |  |
|  | via [H |  |
|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
| +==================================================================+ |
| +------------------------------------------------------------------+ |
| #### Taxes and contributions |
|  |
| Mozambican legislation has a progressive rate of income tax. The |
| rate is from 10% to 32% and depends on your annual income. The income |
| tax is deductible from your income. |
|  |
| Also, the Company will deduct from your salary 3% of |
| social contributions. |
#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

# Benefits in Mozambique

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
  Medical insurance is provided to full-time Yango employees in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers
  planned and emergency medical care services.

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Insurance Company Safety Wing

### Insurance rules**\
1.**The policy is updated at the beginning of the insurance period, on
the 1st of January annually.\ You will be notified through the corporate mailing.**2.**Changing the legal entity within the Yango group and subsequent
visa renewal doesn't impact the insurance.**Maximum coverage limit --- \$500 000**##### Consultation and procedures
- Out-patient 2500\$ - 10% copay
- 👨‍⚕️ Complementary therapies - 10 sessions (up to 15\$ per visit)\
  --- Massage tharepy\
  --- Osteopaths\
  --- Chiropodists and podiatrists\
  --- Chiropractors\
  --- Homeopaths\
  --- Dieticians\
  --- Acupuncture

<!-- -->

  --- Cancer screening\
  --- Cardiovascular and basic vital signs exams\
  --- Basic immunization

<!-- -->

  --- Necessary costs for pregnancy and child birth\
  --- Pre and post natal check-ups for up to 30 days following
  discharge\
  --- 10-month waiting period**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

[Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .]

your mental well-being

### How to use your insurance program?**Pay and claim**(1 option)\
Members can pay out of pocket for their visit and then submit a claim for reimbursement via their dashboard. Claims are paid within 3-15
days.\ \**1. Find a provider**\
Choose your preferred provider and book an appointment\ \**2. Request documents**\
Before you finish the consultation, ask your doctor for these docs:\ ﻿﻿- Medical info and treatment plan\
﻿﻿- Prescriptions (if applicable)\ ﻿﻿- Test results (if applicable)\
﻿﻿- Itemized invoice and proof of payment\ \**3.Submit a claim***\
Log into your [SafetyWing.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://safetywing.com/) profile

﻿﻿- ﻿Procedure cost estimate\ \**3.Submit a request**\
➡️ Pre-approval\
- Check if something is covered\
- You will pay for the expenses and submit a claim for reimbursement\
\ ➡️ Direct billing\
- Ask the insurance company to pay the provider directly\
- ﻿Available when estimated to be more than US\$250\
- ﻿Can take up to 15 days to be set up, immediately available for
emergencies

If you have any questions or difficulties please contact the insurance company

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help

# Region: Africa, Country: Senegal

Employee information and policies for Yango employees in Senegal including payroll, benefits, time off, travel, and offboarding procedures.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: Africa topic: Senegal
---

topic: Senegal
-**Senegal**Pay date**The last business day of each month**Currency**Franc of the Financial Community of Africa (XOF)**Official language**French**Offices**[Ridetech SEN
SUARL**](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/HJBkKz2DZjmvikcU9)

[NEW: Yango SENEGAL, route des Almadies\ 1er étage à gauche\
]

Public Holidays & Vacation**[14 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)**of
public holidays**24 business days**of annual leave

Employee taxes**Income tax (PAYE):**up to 40 %​**Pension contributions:**5.6 % + 2.4 % additionally for executives​​​​**Social security contributions:**2 -- 7.5 %​**Time off**different kind of leaves in Senegal

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 24 business days of annual leave, public
holidays are not included.

You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 24 days manner.​ Also, the vacation period can be split.

You must take your vacation days not later than 3 years after employment.

No sanctions if vacation is not used.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**You must immediately notify your line manager, within 48 hours at the
latest, except in cases of force majeure.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by the physician.

|**\ |
| Other leaves**|
|  |
| According to labour code of Senegal you have the right for 1 -- 3 |
| paid days in terms of special occasions (such as marriage, death of |
| relatives, birth of children etc) after 6 months of seniority​ in the |
| Company. |
|  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| You will need to provide information and all the necessary |
| documents upon request of HR admin. |
| ----- -- ---------------------------------------------------------- |
|  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- |**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**Female employees are entitled to 14 weeks of maternity leave, including
8 weeks' post-natal leave, which may be extended by 3 weeks in the event of illnesses arising from pregnancy or childbirth and certified by
a doctor.**New born leave**An employee has the right, on the occasion of each birth, 1-3 days of paid leave based on birth certificate provision.**\
Breastfeeding leave**A mother has the right daily, to leave one hour earlier for breastfeeding.​

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diem will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in XOF with the exchange rate by day
the calculation is done.​

Please note that daily allowance is taxable due to Senegalese law. Also, you do not have to provide us with proofs of expenses of daily allowance
amounts since it is not required by Senegalese law.

#### [et to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**[As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and
ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

#### Hotline

Violations of the Code of Business Ethics & Conduct

[Non-anonymous reports](mailto:hotline@yango.com)

[Anonymous and non-anonymous reports](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/Issue/Create)

Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

#### Salary

Salary payment is once a month. It is paid at the last business day, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

Within 4 working days after the payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you
can always raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            You should sign monthly payslip and send it back to HR admin.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------

|  | +---------------------------------------------------------------+ |
|  |  | #### Taxes and contributions |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |  | The income tax depends on your total income and can be up to |  |
|  |  | 40 %. The income tax is deductible from your income. |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions |  |
|  |  | to Social security from 2 to 7.5 % of monthly earnings, and |  |
|  |  | Pension contributions -- 5.6 % of monthly earnings + 2.4 % |  |
|  |  | additionally for executives. |  |
|  | +===============================================================+ |
|  | +---------------------------------------------------------------+ |
#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

# Benefits in Senegal

# If you have questions regarding benefits, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**Medical insurance**-----------------------------------------

  For health insurance, employees have an IPM coverage.**Additional financial support**-----------------------------------------

Each of us can get into a difficult life situation.\ If this happens, we are ready to support you emotionally and try to help
you financially.

Please, note that each situation is reviewed on a case-by-case basis. The company reserves the right to decide on providing financial support
at its discretion. Fill out [the application](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13670747/).**Online psychological consultations**OpenUp service is free for Yango employees in Africa and Latin America
and their family members. It is available to everyone starting from their first day at Yango.

All information related to your participation in the OpenUp support program is strictly confidential. Yango doesn't receive any kind of
personal information from the provider. The psychologists are committed to the professional ethical code so any information shared with them is
kept confidential.

### What is OpenUp

it helps you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Online 1:1 sessions with certified psychologists and
lifestyle-experts in over 25 languages
- Online masterclasses, mindfulness and group sessions access
- Self check-in
- Online programs, articles and courses

How many sessions

are available?
- 5 sessions per issue (unlimited number of issues per year) in your
first language

Mobile App is available for [iOS](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://apps.apple.com/nl/app/my-openup/id6444658101) and [Android](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.openup.my) .

### Useful links
- How OpenUp [works for
family](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/4.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20family%20%281%29%20%284%29-1.PDF)
- Quick guide: [Welcome to

- Quick guide: [1-1

- Quick

- Quick guide: [Spaces to
OpenUp](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DuAjEcIo4ugE)
- OpenUp [Mobile App
guide](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/OpenUp%20mobile%20app%20%281%29.pdf)
- What can [I contact OpenUp
for?](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/3.%20How%20OpenUp%20works%20for%20employees%20%281%29.PDF)
- Interesting [facts](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/7.%20TV-screen%20OpenUp%20%5Bdigiboard%5D%20Did%20you%20know%20facts%20%281%29%20%281%29.PDF) about
your mental well-being

|**Сountry specific bonuses and allowances**|
| --- |
|  |
| Transportation allowance |
|  |
| You can find all the details in the Remuneration Policy |
## Сontacts of International Benefits Team

Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com>**Offboarding**To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some information related to offboarding process in Angola.\
If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team
<https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>**1**Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to
confirm the date of resignation**2**[Create a ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
wet-signed [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx)**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to HR at
the office or ask a right contact [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot)**4**Finalize pending expense reports**5**Return company's assets at the last date**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates

## Key Points

#### Payment

Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after your date of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

#### Health insurance

In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

Final documentation

After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both your personal and work email.

Would you need any additional documentation please raise your request via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Workman insurance

Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the month of resignation.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.

| #### Resignation ticket |  |
| --- | --- |
|  |  |
| To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |
| form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |
|  |  |
| Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved |  |
| by your manager and attach your signed resignation letter. |  |
|  |  |
| Please note that standard notice period for resignation in |  |
| Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |
|  |  |
| A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents. |  |
#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill in [the form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach your
resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Can I receive a Job certificate in English?

English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on Portuguese, please
contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a
few days in advance of your resignation date.

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I buy company's equipment?

There are some rules. More information is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/).

#### Can I get the work certificate?

Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last working day.

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**You are entitled to 24 working days of annual leave on full pay in
respect of each 12 months cycle of employment with the Company. Your annual leave entitlement accrues monthly.

It is important to take a minimum of 24 working days of annual leave per year, which leave must be taken within 6 months of the expiry of the
annual leave cycle.\ All annual leave taken during the annual leave cycle will first be
debited from the statutory annual leave entitlement of 24 working days.

Please note that annual leave must be taken at such time or times as are convenient to the Company and in accordance with its annual leave policy
applicable from time to time.  The Company reserves the right to direct when annual leave must  be taken.

Vacation days not transferable to next leave cycle and any vacation days not taken are paid off. As long as the vacation days accrued by the
employee are paid off, no penalties/sanctions exist if employee takes no vacation.**\
Sick leave**In case you are unable to perform normal duties due to illness or injury not occasioned by  default shall notify the Company of the illness or
injury and proceed on sick leave on production of a medical certificate from a health practitioner.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

#### Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick note) issued by a by the authorized medical practitioner. First 3 months full pay, after 3 months half pay and termination on medical grounds if sickness prolongs to 6 months.**Unpaid Leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

Unpaid leave in exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.

#### Mother's Day

A female employee is entitled to one day's absence from work each month without having to produce a medical certificate or give reason to the
employer.

#### Compassionate Leave

Compassionate leave can be granted to you for a period of at least 12 days in a calendar year for the following events:
- lost a spouse, child, dependent or parent;
- uponoccurrence of other justifiable compassionate ground at the
  discretion of the Company.

The leave will be granted upon presentation of proof, where appropriate, of the occurrence of the event.

#### Compassionate leave is not accumulative.

####

####  Family Responsibility Leave

In case you have worked for a period of at least 6 months within the Company, you have a right for family responsibility leave for a period
not exceeding 7 days in a year.

This leave is granted to care for a sick spouse, child or dependant, after providing a certificate from a medical doctor certifying that the
spouse, child or dependant is sick and requires special attention.

Also, you are entitled to 3 paid leave days per year to cover any responsibilities relating to the care, health or education of your
spouse, child or dependent.

## Childcare

If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to
organize childcare leaves.

#### Maternity leave

Every female employee who has completed at least two years of continuous service with the Company from the date of the first engagement shall, on
the production of a medical certificate as to her pregnancy signed  by a registered medical practitioner, be entitled to maternity leave of 14
weeks.

Maternity leave may be extended in case of multiple births for a further period of 4 weeks.

Also, in the case of the birth to a premature child, the leave can be extended for a period that shall be recommended by a medical doctor.

The maternity leave shall be taken either immediately preceding the expected date of delivery (except that at least 6 weeks maternity leave,
in such case, shall be taken immediately after delivery) or shall be taken after  the delivery.

#### Nursing Breaks

A female employee who is nursing a child whom she has not weaned, is entitled each working day  (for 6 months from the date of delivery), at
a time convenient to the employee and having regard to the needs of the child, to at least two nursing breaks  of thirty minutes each or one
nursing break  of one hour.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid before or after your business trip finishes with claims done via Expensify by simply indicating the number of business
trip days multiplied by the applicable rate depending on destination country or local rate. All other out of pocket expenses incurred during
the business trip will need to have supporting receipts and claimed via Expensify too. The payment will be in ZMW with the exchange rate as of
the day the claim is made.​

#### [Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>**Policies**[As a public company, Yandex / Yango is compliant with all laws and
ethics norms. The rules help us get along well with each other and with our business partners.]

|  |  | Christmas |  |  |  |
|  |  | bonus |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |

|  |  | all the |  |  |  |

|  |  | Remuneration |  |  |  |
|  |  | Policy |  |  |  |
|  | +----------------+ |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |

|  | <int_benefits@yango.com> |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |**Offboarding**|  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some |  |  |
|  | information related to offboarding process in Angola.\ |  |  |
|  | If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not |  |  |
|  | found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support |  |  |
|  | team |  |  |
|  | <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot> |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |**1**Talk to |  |  |
|  | your [manager](h |  |  |
|  | ttps://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/off |  |  |
|  | boarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to |  |  |
|  | confirm the date of resignation |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |**2**[Create a |  |  |
|  | ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and |  |  |
|  | attach your wet-signed [resignation |  |  |
|  | letter](https://jing.yandex-tea |  |  |
|  | m.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx) |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |

|  | to HR at the office or ask a right |  |  |

|  |**4**Finalize pending expense reports |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  |**5**Return company's assets at the last date |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |

|  |  |  |  |
|  | ## Key Points |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Payment |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after |  |  |
|  | your date of resignation. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, |  |  |
|  | accrued up until your last day. |  |  |

|  | Please reach out |  |  |
|  | to [Helpy](https |  |  |

|  | to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Final documentation |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by |  |  |
|  | both your personal and work email. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Would you need any additional documentation please raise your |  |  |
|  | request |  |  |
|  | via [Hel |  |  |
|  | py](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Workman insurance |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the |  |  |
|  | month of resignation. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Please reach out |  |  |
|  | to [Helpy](https |  |  |
|  | ://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding |  |  |
|  | to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | +-----------------------------------------------------+----+ |  |  |
|  |  | #### Resignation ticket |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | To create a ticket for your resignation fill |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | in [the |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | f |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | orm](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Please specify the date of resignation in the form, |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | approved by your manager and attach your signed |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | resignation letter. |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Please note that standard notice period for |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | resignation in Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | A blank for resignation letter you can find in |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Documents. |  |  |  |  |
|  | +=====================================================+====+ |  |  |
|  | +-----------------------------------------------------+----+ |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Expense reports |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses |  |  |
|  | before you leave. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Expense report instruction can be |  |  |
|  | found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business- |  |  |
|  | expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/). |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Please fill in [the |  |  |
|  | form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach |  |  |
|  | your resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically |  |  |
|  | generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any |  |  |
|  | additional information is needed. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Who is my manager? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as |  |  |
|  | Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/). |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Is this possible to receive a reference letter? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | If you need a reference letter, please contact support |  |  |
|  | via [Hel |  |  |
|  | py](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I receive a Job certificate in English? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, |  |  |
|  | if you would like to have an addition Job certificate on |  |  |
|  | Portuguese, please contact support |  |  |
|  | via [Help |  |  |
|  | y](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a |  |  |
|  | few days in advance of your resignation date. |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### How can I contact HR after the termination date? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Please send an email with your question |  |  |
|  | on <helpy@yandex-team.ru> |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I buy company's equipment? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | There are some rules. More information |  |  |
|  | is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/). |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I get the work certificate? |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
|  | Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your |  |  |
|  | last working day. |  |  |
| +================================================================+ |  |
|  |  |  |  |
| +----------------------------------------------------------------+ |  |
