# Region: Asia, Country: Turkey, Topic: TELUS Health

This document provides information about TELUS Health psychological support services available to Yandex employees in Turkey, including access details and available resources.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: Asia country: Turkey
topic: Telus
---

country: Turkey topic: Telus
- People, their physical and mental wellbeing, have always been at the
core of Yango. To create a comfortable environment where everyone feels looked after, we are offering a psychological support program for all
our employees across all our locations around the world.

[TELUS Health](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.telushealth.com/) (formely
LifeWorks) is a well-known and respected corporate support provider with over 50 years of experience offering technology-driven employee care and
HR services around the world.

TELUS Health service is free for company employees and available to everyone starting from their first day, including those on their
probation period.

All information related to your participation in the TELUS Health support program is strictly confidential. No information will be shared
with anyone without your informed, voluntary and written consent.

### TELUS Health' support service can help

you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Strengthen relationships and improve communication
- Deal with stress, anxiety and depression
- Resolve personal and emotional difficulties
- Address marital and relationship difficulties
- Understand grief and bereavement
- Find solutions for work-related issues
- Work towards life goals
- Cope with isolation and loneliness
- Adapt across cultures
- Identify and cope with culture shock
- Access crisis and trauma support

### How many sessions are available?
-**5 sessions per issue**(unlimited number of issues per year) in
your first language over the telephone, online or in person.

### How to use service

1\. Download the [Mobile app](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://app.lifeworks.com/?utm_source%3Dlifeworks.com%26utm_medium%3Dwebsite%26utm_campaign%3Dalternate_header) for
iOS or Andriod.

2\. Sign up using [quick link](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://app.lifeworks.com/?utm_source%3Dlifeworks.com%26utm_medium%3Dwebsite%26utm_campaign%3Dalternate_header) using
login and password from the list with countries below.

You can also view personalized content for self-guided help, browse hundreds of articles, use toolkits, listen to audio recordings and find
more information on family, health, life, work or money on the [TELUS Heath](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://app.lifeworks.com/?_ga%3D2.187440168.1635592645.1657120190-1712669688.1657119957) or
in [the app](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://app.lifeworks.com/?utm_source%3Dlifeworks.com%26utm_medium%3Dwebsite%26utm_campaign%3Dalternate_header).

### Сontacts
- You can find country login and password, hotline number and
materials in the local language below.
- With any technical issues with TELUS Health Web Portal or Mobile
App, toll-free lines please visit [help.lifeworks.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://help.lifeworks.com).
- With any questions regarding the usage of the TELUS Health service,
please contact <hr-medicine@yandex-team.ru>.
- If there is no local toll-free number in your country, you can
use [Cisco Jabber](https://doc.yandex-team.ru/help/diy/common/telephony/cisco-jabber.html?lang=en) or [SIP
telephony](https://doc.yandex-team.ru/help/diy/common/telephony/sip-telephony.html) for International calls at no cost

# Region: Asia, Country: Turkey, Topic: Compliance

This document outlines compliance policies and regulations that all Yandex employees in Turkey must follow, including both global and local procedures.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: Asia country: Turkey
topic: Compliance Turkey
---

country: Turkey topic: Compliance Turkey
- # Policies

All employees must follow procedures and regulations, established by the company, either these regulations are global or local ones.

Here you have a collection of the main company's internal rules, that will help you to get a deep understanding of the best practices in the
company.

Please be aware that all this information is mandatory to read, understand and follow. You will be asked by HR Admin to accept these
policies via the Tracker or/and physical signature in the office.

Please be aware that in case of not accepting these policies on time, we will have to suspend you from your job tasks.**FAQ****What kinds of gifts can I give and receive?**Gifts that cost no more than ₽11,000 including taxes and the cost\
of packaging, and that don't look like an attempt to influence\ business decisions. For example, you cannot give money, gift
certificates, jewelry,\ or trips.

Please note that the maximum value for gifts may be lower due to a\ recipient's internal rules or local laws. For example, gifts to
government officials\ in Russia must not cost more than ₽3000. You can read more about
gifts [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/compliance-week/explanation-on-gifts/explanation-on-gifts-en/).**What do I do if a colleague is rude?**At Yandex, insults, aggressive communications, and discrimination are\ unacceptable. It doesn't matter where the conversation takes place:
in the\ office, a ticket, a bar after work, or a non-work chat.

We are always respectful and polite towards our colleagues or users. Above\
all else, we're professionals who are united by our work.

If someone approaches you using unacceptable language:
- First, talk to the other person: you may simply have misunderstood
each other and\ can easily resolve the conflict.\
- If for whatever reason you don't think you can talk to your
colleague,\ contact your HR partner or manager.\
- If that doesn't help resolve the conflict, write
to [\@hotline](mailto:hotline@yandex-team.ru) or make an anonymous report to the hotline\
([yandex.hotline.b1.ru](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://yandex.hotline.b1.ru/)).**Can I have a second job while also working at Yandex?**Yes, but it's important to play by the rules. The most important thing is\
that you don't compromise the quality of your work or the interests of Yandex.

Any second job must first be discussed with your manager and HR partner. It is your\
responsibility to promptly report a conflict and do everything you can to\
prevent it.

If you decide to start doing another job, then please note the key risks of\
a conflict of interest:

1\. If your second employer is a Yandex competitor, supplier, or client, then\
a conflict of interest may arise. Be sure to evaluate this risk first.\ Read
more [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/sovmeshhenie-raboty-v-jandekse-s-drugojj-rabotojj/can-i-have-a-second-job-while-also-working-at-yandex/).\
2. You may not use Yandex material or intellectual resources. This means
that\ you cannot use your work computer, code, texts, developments, or any
other\ information resulting from the work of Yandex employees.\
3. You cannot use confidential Yandex information for another job.\
4. You cannot use your Yandex credentials or access to resources or
information for\ any purpose in another company.\
5. If you have access to information at Yandex that could potentially
give\ another company a competitive advantage, you cannot work for that
company.\
6. You can only do other work outside of your Yandex working hours.

If you have any questions or concerns, write to [\@compliance](mailto:compliance@yandex-team.ru)

Also, please do not forget that if you start working somewhere else, you\
need to update your information in the [Conflict of Interest questionnaire](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/13286/).
You also still\ need to alert the situation to your manager, your HR partner,\
and, if necessary, the Compliance Department.**Can I own my own business?**Yes, you can run your own business, launch a startup or act as an\ independent contractor. But only if:
- Your position, access rights, and credentials at Yandex do not imply
that you\ could use them to obtain any preferential treatment for your business.\
- Your business does not compete with Yandex services.

For example, you cannot use confidential information, intellectual property,\
equipment, other Yandex property and resources, or the Yandex brand to develop or\
promote your private business or commercial projects.

You also cannot conclude contracts with your company on behalf of Yandex,\
do anything to influence the execution of these contracts, or make\ decisions at Yandex about working with your company or business.

If you know that your business could become a Yandex supplier, client, or partner or\
a competitor of any of our services, assess the risks of a conflict of interest [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/conflict/can-employees-open-their-own-business/).

If you're planning to launch your own business or become a co-owner of a business,\
be sure to discuss the possibility of a conflict of interest\ with your manager and HR partner. When in doubt,
contact [\@compliance](mailto:compliance@yandex-team.ru) and we'll help you figure out\
the answer.

Also, please don't forget to promptly update your information in the [Conflict of Interest
questionnaire](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/13286/) it is your\
responsibility.**Can I teach and have speaking engagements as a personal business?**Of course, but we ask you to keep a few things in mind.
- You can teach and lecture in your free time, but you need to get
approval from\ your manager beforehand.**Where you can teach**- If you're lecturing in a Yandex educational platform, then there's
no conflict of\ interest. You can also give lectures on general topics at universities
and other\ educational institutions.
- If you want to teach on a competing platform, we recommend that you
first check if\ Yandex.Education or Practicum offer a similar field of study.**What you can't use**- You cannot use the Yandex name to promote your lectures or
presentations. You can\ mention your work experience, but you cannot use the Yandex name as a
selling point.
- You cannot use confidential work information or talk about any
non-public\ processes or life at Yandex. If you're ever unsure if information is
confidential,\ ask  [\@nda](mailto:nda@yandex-team.ru).
- You cannot use the results of anyone's work at Yandex, including
your own. This\ means you can't use anyone's code, text, or other resource in your
presentations.**Other things to consider**You cannot offer the audience any privileges at Yandex. For example, you can't\
promise to help someone pass an interview.

Read more [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/prepodavanie-i-vystuplenija-kak-lichnyjj-biznes/are-teaching-and-public-speaking-acceptable/).**Can my relative's or close friend's company become a Yandex
supplier?**Yes. However, you must first assess whether you personally influence the decision at\
Yandex about this supplier and whether you have access to confidential company\
information that the supplier could use to its benefit. Read more about how to\
assess this risk [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/sotrudnik-ili-ego-rodstvennik-svjazan-s-postavshhikom-jandeksa/can-employees-or-their-relatives-be-associated-with-a-yandex-supplier/).

If you find yourself involved in a similar conflict of interest, report it to the\
Procurement Department and your manager. Then withdraw from any decision-making\
process concerning this supplier.

If need guidance, contact [\@compliance](mailto:@compliance)

Also, please don't forget to promptly update your information in the ["Conflict\
of Interest" form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/13286/). Please
note that this questionnaire is mandatory.**Can I work with relatives?**Yes, provided there is no conflict of interest.

This means that you can't report to one another, work on any projects together\
without the involvement of other employees, or make decisions together on related\
issues.

Relatives includes parents, spouses, children, and brothers and sisters. Any other\
romantic or close personal relationship where the other person is significant to you\
also counts.

Read more about how to assess such situations [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/compliance/prepodavanie-i-vystuplenija-kak-lichnyjj-biznes/rabota-rodstvennikov-v-jandekse/can-my-relatives-work-at-yandex/).

If you find yourself in a situation like, be sure talk to your HR partner. If you\
need further guidance, contact [\@compliance](mailto:compliance@yandex-team.ru) and
we'll help you\ figure it out.

## General leaves

#### Annual leave

Length of statutory annual paid leave entitlements depends on length of service:
- 1 to 5 years (including five years) - 14 working days;
- 6 (inclusive) to 14 (inclusive) years - 20 working days;
- 15 years and more - 26 working days.

Employees who are younger than 18 or older than 50 years old must be given at least 20 working days of annual paid leave.

We can grant you a leave before the end of the first year if you fill in this [application by
hand.](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/kulikovalisa/T%C3%BCrkiye%20_%C4%B0zin-formu_%D1%84%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BC%D0%B0%20%D0%B4%D0%BB%D1%8F%20%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0.xls) You need to bring this application to the HR team in the office.

Unused leave is carried over to the next year.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly "for personal
reasons" or "for family reasons"). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
              According to local legislation unpaid leave is not available for foreigners.
  ------- --- -----------------------------------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

#### Sick leave

You must immediately notify your line manager, within 48 hours at the latest, except in cases of force majeure.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a physician.

#### Other leaves

##### Marriage:

3 paid days for your marriage

##### Bereavement leave:

3 paid days for the death of mother, father, spouse, siblings or  child

##### Family Leave:

10 paid days  for an employee who is parent of a child with a disability rating of at least 70% or a child who receives treatment for a chronic
disease

##### Military leave:

An employee can take unpaid leave in case of one month military service

## Childcare

If this is a current case and you need to take these types of time off, please raise ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you
to organize childcare leaves.

#### Maternity/Paternity leave

A mother has 16 weeks of rest due to maternity leave, which can be distributed in two stages:
- 8 weeks of pre-natal rest, and
- 8 weeks of post-natal rest.

​The rest may be extended in case of multiple births or birth of children with disabilities.

​A father can be granted 5 paid days of paternity leave.

####  Post Natal Leave Options

##### 1. Unpaid leaves for mothers:

A female employee can be granted an unpaid leave of up to six months after the expiry of the maternity leave.

##### 2. Half working leave

An employee will work for the half of her weekly working time for a period of (the salary will be paid prorated):
- first birth - 60 days
- second birth - 120 days
- following births -180 days
- multiple babies - +30 days
- in case of disabled child - 360 days

#### Part-Time Work for parents

One of parent can request to transfer them to part-time work before a child reaches mandatory primary school age.

Employee's salary must be pro-rated by employer based on employee's working hours.

Employed spouse cannot request part-time work, if other parent is not working.

#### Breastfeeding leave

A mother has the right daily, to breastfeed her child before the age of one, during working hours, to a special rest, paid as working time, of
half an hour in the morning and half an hour in the afternoon.

## FAQ

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days than it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4.

To cancel you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

- How to get to Workinton**How to get there within the city**The nearest metro station is Osmanbey (green line).\
\ [Map
hint](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/pWcFURHUbD6Su35j9?g_st%3Dic).\ \
You can also use the public transport like buses (number:**DT1**,**U2**) and Turkish small cars called dolmush (exit at
Lotus Nişantaşı stop).**How to get there from the airport**From the airport you can use a shuttle by Havaist from İST airport to Taksim, then you have to go just one station up by metro till Osmanbey
and the station leads directly inside the Lotus mall where our office is located.\
\ You can check the time of the transfer on [the official
website](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.hava.ist/?lang%3Den).\ \
A taxi ride from İST Airport to the office will cost approximately**700 TL**(the price may vary).

Triglyceride, Uric acid, Creatinine, Total Protein, Albumin, SGPT, GGT, TSH, Complete Blood Count (\>18 parameters), Sedimentation Rate (ESR),
Full Urine Analysis, BUN, T4**Policy usage process**For medical expenses in Contracted Healthcare Facilities (have "Direct Payment" comment on the list below) the payment shall be made by the
Insurer to the relevant Healthcare Facility in line with the specified coverage limits and copayment.

Policy coverage, limits and deductibles are given in the table "**Policy terms&conditions (Limits and cover)"**above.

In order to get treatment, you should contact the facility that you would like to visit via contacts provided in the interactive list of
health care facilities as described in the top of this document via the link below:

<https://www.allianz.com.tr/tr_TR/anlasmali-kurumlar/anlasmali-saglik-kurumlari.html#/>

Information to be provided to the Health Care Facility to get treatment paid by the Insurer (Allianz):
- Your full name;
- Your Turkish ID;
- Name of your insurer (Allianz Sigorta A.Ş. ("Allianz"))

No certificate is needed.

If you need help or have questions regarding the cover or experiencing issues with the Facility, please contact the Insurance Broker Nart via
contacts that are provided further in this document.**Copay (deductible)**Deductible is a part of the bill for treatment that is not paid by the Insurer (Allianz) even if the Health Care Facility is Contracted. In
case the deductible is applied the amount of the deductible has to be covered by the Insured in the Facility at his own expense.

The list of treatments that include deductible and their sizes is specified in the table "**Policy terms&conditions (Limits and cover)"**.

In other cases, the entire bill for treatment in Contracted Health Care Facilities will be covered by the Insurer (Allianz).**Reimbursement process in Non-Contracted Health Care Facilities**In case you visit an out of network health care facility (facility that
is not listed via the link of contracted facilities above) -- the reimbursement process will take place.

Then healthcare expense is paid by the Insured to the respective Healthcare Facility (Non-Contracted Healthcare Facilities), the expense
shall be reimbursed according to the limits and treatment list specified in the table "**Policy terms&conditions (Limits and cover)"**above.

To request reimbursement:
- Contact your Insurance Broker -- Nart (contacts listed further in this
  document);
- Collect and forward them a list of documents (see below;
- Receive a "Treatment Expenses Request Form" from the broker, fill in
  the form and forward it back to the broker.

Upon review of the submitted documents Allianz Sigorta A.Ş. Head Office shall transfer the relevant payment(s) to the bank accounts (belonging
to relevant insured parties) as declared by the Policyholder.

Information and documents required are:

a\) Original invoice issued in the name of Policyholder

b\) Detailed invoice breakdown if multiple items exist on the invoice (e.g. hospitalization, examination, analysis, x-ray etc.)

c\) Original prescription, medicine price tags and barcode/datamatrix

d\) Analysis request form and results (might be a copy)

e\) Hospitalization epicrisis report, surgery report, detailed medical history, pathology report etc.

f\) Detailed physician's report regarding diagnosis/treatment for interventions

g\) For physical therapy and rehabilitation procedures, physical therapist's report indicating the detailed treatment plan (beginning and
end dates should be specified)

h\) Documents issued by relevant judicial authorities (Incident Scene Investigation Report, Breath Analysis Report, Forensic Report, Traffic
Accident Report, Prosecutor's Opinion, Workplace Accident report, etc.) for judicial cases (including traffic accidents)

ı) Photocopies of identity documents belonging to the Policyholder and account holder if the damage claim payment amount to be paid by Allianz
Sigorta AŞ is equal to or above 20,000 TRY

i\) Photocopies of relevant passport pages showing country exits and entrances for foreign country damage claim reports

country: Turkey topic: Office Navigation Workinton
- About Workinton**Office Navigation**Our office is an open space area.\
\ There are about 20 work-desks and most of them belong to locally
employed Yandex Ads and back-office employees, but there are also some places available for those who come to our office for a business trip.\
\ \
As it is a co-working area you can also use seats & spaces in the floor common area outside of our room.\
\ We also have a designated bookable meeting room number A10 - at the end
of the corridor, it named**Nigde**([you can find it on the map](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/map?conference_rooms=1&rooms=1)).\
\ You can enter the room by using Yandex badge.\
\ And also we have two more rooms -**C19 (Batman)**and**C20
(Datça)**that you can enter using physical key.\ \
You can find the key in the cabinet behind the table of the office manager - [Cennet
Bingol](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/jennety).\ \
• Side with Nigde Meeting Room & Event Room (our first office):**5687#**\
\ • Side with Rooms D1 & D2:**0987#**\
\ \
We can use other chargeable meeting rooms in Workinton 4 days per month.\
\ Note that you should book a room for at least 4 hours (so the option
works for long-lasting mtgs).\ \
To book them write to [Cennet Bingol](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/jennety).\
\ \
If you need to use the silence room, please don't also forget to book it, it named**Kız Kulesi**.\
\ \
\**Note that Workinton is a pet-friendly co-working where tenants can bring their cats and dogs to work. Keep that in mind if you have any
allergic reaction to pets.**

sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

Within 4 working days after the payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you
can always raise your question via Helpy.**Taxes and contributions**The Company will deduct from your salary contributions to AFP (Pension funds) with 12.71 % of your salary.

The rate of payments to National Solidarity Fund are 1.15%, 5.74% and
11.48%, and the deduction depends on your salary.

The rate of Income tax (RC-IVA) is 13% of the total salary and the deduction depends on your salary. Also, this tax can be compensated with
the purchase invoices from you.

Completed form 110 and the invoices must be declared to the SIAT webpage HR team until 10th of each month, however, the sooner the better.

Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click here. If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

     8	
     9	Public Holidays & Vacation**[16 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)**of
    10	public holidays**30 calendar days**of annual leave
    11	
    12	Employee taxes**Income tax:**up to 30% depending\ on the annual remuneration**Pension fund:**10-13% depending on a chosen\
    13	pension system
    14	
    15	  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Time off**-----------------------------------------------------------------------
    16	
    17	  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
    18	
    19	different kind of leaves in Peru
    20	
    21	How to organize your time off
    22	
    23	1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off
    24	
    25	2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts
    26	
    27	3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)
    28	
    29	4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner
    30	
    31	5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed
    32	
    33	6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 30 calendar days of annual leave, public
    34	holidays are not included. You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 30 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split
    35	in the following way:
    36	- 15 calendar days, which should be used in periods of 7 and 8 days in a
    37	  row;
    38	- the rest of the vacation period can be divided into different periods
    39	  with a minimum of 1 calendar day.
    40	
    41	Vacation for the previous period should be used during the current year, it shouldn't be transferred and must be paid out in cash if it is not
    42	used.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.
    43	
    44	This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
    45	reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.
    46	
    47	  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    48	            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
    49	  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------
    50	
    51	  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate
    52	certifying that this leave was granted by the authorized physician.
    53	
    54	Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.
    55	
    56	Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a by the authorized physician.**Leave for the assistance of family members\
    57	in a delicate state of health**This is a leave of absence with the purpose that you can assist your direct family members or those diagnosed in a serious or terminal
    58	condition or suffer an accident that puts their life at serious risk.
    59	
    60	This leave only applies for the care and assistance of your direct relatives: parents, children, spouse or partner.
    61	
    62	7 continuous calendar days are granted on account of vacation.
    63	
    64	  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
    65	            Уou should provide us the application form, fully signed by the authorized physician.
    66	  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------
    67	
    68	  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
    69	leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**A mother has 98 calendar days of rest due to maternity leave, which can
    70	be distributed in two stages:
    71	- 49 days of pre-natal rest;
    72	- 49 days of post-natal rest.
    73	
    74	The rest may be extended by 30 additional days in case of multiple births or birth of children with disabilities.**Paternity leave**Paternity leave is granted to fathers to attend the birth of their
    75	child.
    76	
    77	It is granted 10 days of paid leave, it cannot be waived or substituted. The period may be extended up to 30 additional days in special cases.**Adoption leave**You will have a leave of thirty calendar days for the adoption process
    78	of a minor for the strengthening of the paternal-filial bond.**Breastfeeding leave**A mother has a leave of one hour per day within the working day, which is counted as one hour worked, for breastfeeding purpose.
    79	
    80	This is the mandatory benefit, and a mother cannot cease from this benefit, nor compensate or substitute it.
    81	
    82	#### Who is my manager?
    83	
    84	Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).
    85	
    86	#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?
    87	
    88	Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).
    89	
    90	#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.
    91	
    92	Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
    93	your absence and the better way to fill this absence.
    94	
    95	#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?
    96	
    97	This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.
    98	
    99	#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?
   100	
   101	Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
   102	on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.
   103	
   104	#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?
   105	
   106	You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.
   107	
   108	You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
   109	you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.
   110	
   111	##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
   112	answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>
   113	
   114	Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
   115	and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.
   116	
   117	Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in PEN with the exchange rate as of
   118	approximately 20th of the month of payment.
   119	
   120	Daily allowance is not taxable due to Peruvian law, hence you do not have to pay income tax from them. Also, you do not have to provide us
   121	with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts since it is not required by Peruvian legislation.
   122	
   123	#### [Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)
   124	
   125	To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
   126	searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
   127	to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
   128	to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).
   129	
   130	Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
   131	( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)
   132	
   133	How the business trip process is organized
   134	1. Create a request
   135	
   136	Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
   137	2. Wait for approval
   138	
   139	Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
   140	3. Book travel and accommodation
   141	
   142	Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
   143	4. Woohoo, you're all set!
   144	
   145	Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
   146	5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy
   147	
   148	All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports
   149	
   150	## General rules
   151	
   152	Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
   153	business trip:\
   154	- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
   155	- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
   156	- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
   157	- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
   158	availability of visa slots).
   159	
   160	Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>

   172	
   173	| #### Taxes and contributions |
   174	|  |
   175	| Peruvian legislation has a progressive rate of income tax. The rate |
   176	| is from 0 to 30% and depends on your annual income. The income tax is |
   177	| deductible from your income. |
   178	|  |
   179	| Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to APF |
   180	| (Pension funds) and the % will depend on an AFP you chose, however, |
   181	| normally it's around 12-13%. |

   183	| ------------------------------------------------------------------ |

   190	Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
   191	who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

   194	If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

   782	|  |  |  |
   783	|  | ## Key Points |  |
   784	|  |  |  |

   794	|  |  |  |

   799	|  | to [Helpy](htt |  |
   800	|  | ps://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding |  |

   809	|  | request |  |
   810	|  | via [H |  |
   811	|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
   812	|  |  |  |

   814	|  |  |  |

   817	|  |  |  |

   825	|  |  |  |  |  |  |
   826	|  |  | To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |  |  |
   827	|  |  | form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |  |  |

   830	|  |  | approved by your manager and attach your signed |  |  |  |
   831	|  |  | resignation letter. |  |  |  |
   832	|  |  |  |  |  |  |
   833	|  |  | Please note that standard notice period for |  |  |  |
   834	|  |  | resignation in Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |  |  |

   837	|  |  | Documents. |  |  |  |

   847	|  | found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/busines |  |
   848	|  | s-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/). |  |
   849	|  |  |  |
   850	|  | We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance. |  |
   851	|  |  |  |
   852	|  | #### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation? |  |
   853	|  |  |  |
   854	|  | Please fill in [the |  |
   855	|  | form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach |  |
   856	|  | your resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically |  |
   857	|  | generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any |  |
   858	|  | additional information is needed. |  |
   859	|  |  |  |
   860	|  | #### Who is my manager? |  |
   861	|  |  |  |
   862	|  | Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head |  |
   863	|  | on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/). |  |
   864	|  |  |  |
   865	|  | #### Is this possible to receive a reference letter? |  |

   868	|  | via [H |  |
   869	|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
   870	|  |  |  |
   871	|  | #### Can I receive a Job certificate in English? |  |

   875	|  | Portuguese, please contact support |  |
   876	|  | via [He |  |
   877	|  | lpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a |  |
   878	|  | few days in advance of your resignation date. |  |
   879	|  |  |  |
   880	|  | #### How can I contact HR after the termination date? |  |
   881	|  |  |  |
   882	|  | Please send an email with your question |  |
   883	|  | on <helpy@yandex-team.ru> |  |
   884	|  |  |  |
   885	|  | #### Can I buy company's equipment? |  |
   886	|  |  |  |
   887	|  | There are some rules. More information |  |
   888	|  | is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/). |  |
   889	|  |  |  |
   890	|  | #### Can I get the work certificate? |  |
   891	|  |  |  |
   892	|  | Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last |  |
   893	|  | working day. |  |
   894	|  |  |  |
   895	|  | # Сommittees |  |
   896	|  |  |  |
   897	|  | +-------------------------------------------------------------+ |  |

   899	|  |  | > Peru. |  |  |
   900	|  | +=============================================================+ |  |
   901	|  | +-------------------------------------------------------------+ |  |
   902	|  |  |  |
   903	|  | #### Health and Safety Committee |  |
   904	|  |  |  |

   906	|  |  |  |
   907	|  | The main goal of the HSE committee is to coordinate the efforts |  |
   908	|  | of employers and employees to create a safe working environment |  |
   909	|  | and prevent work-related injuries and illnesses. This includes |  |
   910	|  | developing and implementing programs to improve work conditions, |  |
   911	|  | monitoring work conditions in the workplace, conducting regular |  |
   912	|  | inspections of work sites, participating in special assessments |  |
   913	|  | of working conditions, conducting risk assessments, and |  |
   914	|  | investigating incidents and near-miss events. |  |
   915	|  |  |  |
   916	|  | Members of the committee: |  |

   930	|  | Claudia](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/maclagodoy) |  |
   931	|  |  |  |
   932	|  | #### Committee for the Intervention against Sexual Harassment |  |
   933	|  |  |  |
   934	|  | Validity period: November 8th, 2024 -- November 7th, 2026. |  |
   935	|  |  |  |

---

topic: Peru
-**Peru**Pay date**Last business day of each month**Currency**Peruvian Soles (PEN)**Official language**Spanish**Offices**[Delivery Technologies
S.A.C**](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://maps.app.goo.gl/LWtKACBhK3zctC6W8)

Public Holidays & Vacation**[16 days](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/calendar/kalendar-na-2024-eng/)**of
public holidays**30 calendar days**of annual leave

Employee taxes**Income tax:**up to 30% depending\ on the annual remuneration**Pension fund:**10-13% depending on a chosen\
pension system

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Time off**-----------------------------------------------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------

different kind of leaves in Peru

How to organize your time off

1 Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

2 Specify your time off at the Absence Planner on Staff. For vacation set it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

3 There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

4 Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the Absence Planner

5 A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

6 Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 30 calendar days of annual leave, public
holidays are not included. You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 30 days manner. However, the vacation period can be split
in the following way:
- 15 calendar days, which should be used in periods of 7 and 8 days in a
  row;
- the rest of the vacation period can be divided into different periods
  with a minimum of 1 calendar day.

Vacation for the previous period should be used during the current year, it shouldn't be transferred and must be paid out in cash if it is not
used.**Unpaid leave**On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take unpaid vacation.

This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for personal
reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Sick leave**It is necessary for you to submit to the employer a certificate
certifying that this leave was granted by the authorized physician.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences.

Sickness is paid only if you provide a medical certificate (sick list) issued by a by the authorized physician.**Leave for the assistance of family members\
in a delicate state of health**This is a leave of absence with the purpose that you can assist your direct family members or those diagnosed in a serious or terminal
condition or suffer an accident that puts their life at serious risk.

This leave only applies for the care and assistance of your direct relatives: parents, children, spouse or partner.

7 continuous calendar days are granted on account of vacation.

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Уou should provide us the application form, fully signed by the authorized physician.
  ------ -- --------------------------------------------------------------

  ------------------------------------------------------------------------**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of
leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**A mother has 98 calendar days of rest due to maternity leave, which can
be distributed in two stages:
- 49 days of pre-natal rest;
- 49 days of post-natal rest.

The rest may be extended by 30 additional days in case of multiple births or birth of children with disabilities.**Paternity leave**Paternity leave is granted to fathers to attend the birth of their
child.

It is granted 10 days of paid leave, it cannot be waived or substituted. The period may be extended up to 30 additional days in special cases.**Adoption leave**You will have a leave of thirty calendar days for the adoption process
of a minor for the strengthening of the paternal-filial bond.**Breastfeeding leave**A mother has a leave of one hour per day within the working day, which is counted as one hour worked, for breastfeeding purpose.

This is the mandatory benefit, and a mother cannot cease from this benefit, nor compensate or substitute it.

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### How can I get access to Absence Planner?

Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](http://gap.yandex-team.ru/).

#### I was sick, but I do not have a medical certificate.

Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss
your absence and the better way to fill this absence.

#### What happens if my manager did not approve vacation?

This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.

#### Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?

Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.**Note**Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days then it is in fact.

#### Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?

You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4. To cancel
you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

##**Travel**If you have questions regarding business trips and you have not found an
answer on this page, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem (daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to,
and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. The payment will be in PEN with the exchange rate as of
approximately 20th of the month of payment.

Daily allowance is not taxable due to Peruvian law, hence you do not have to pay income tax from them. Also, you do not have to provide us
with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts since it is not required by Peruvian legislation.

#### [Get to know how to organize a business trip and check appropriate daily allowance rate](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/travel-all/)

To organize your business trip you may use [Business Trips](http://trip.yandex-team.ru/). The platform allows you to make
searching, booking and approving travel tickets and hotels. You can use the option to select your preferred currency (rubles, dollars, or euros)
to manage your travel budget better. If you have any questions about the platform, feel free to reach out
to [\@HelpyTravelBot](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/HelpyTravelBot).

Also you can find more information [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/users/anngolovina/oformlenie-komandirovok-mezhdunarodnyx-ofisov1/)
( Trip approval, Travel policy: tickets, hotels, Per diem, Change/cancel trip, make report)

How the business trip process is organized
1. Create a request

Decide on travel dates, itinerary, and other details beforehand
2. Wait for approval

Requests are normally approved by your manager or HRBP
3. Book travel and accommodation

Select your flights/train tickets and hotel
4. Woohoo, you're all set!

Read about taxis, connectivity, and other important travel considerations
5. There's a fair amount of bureaucracy

All you need to know about daily allowances and business trip reports

## General rules

Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

Follow this link to issue TRAVEL request <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>

# Payroll

If you have questions regarding payroll, please reach out to a support team <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot>

#### Salary

Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business day, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

At the day of payment you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can always
raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

| #### Taxes and contributions |
|  |
| Peruvian legislation has a progressive rate of income tax. The rate |
| is from 0 to 30% and depends on your annual income. The income tax is |
| deductible from your income. |
|  |
| Also, the Company will deduct from your salary contributions to APF |
| (Pension funds) and the % will depend on an AFP you chose, however, |
| normally it's around 12-13%. |
|  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Tax-exempts: CTS, per diems, material help |
| ----- ------------------------------------------------------------ |
|  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
#### Reimbursement

Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs. When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant
who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

#### How can I update my bank details in systems?

Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.

#### How was my KPI bonus calculated?

The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### Who is my manager?

Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

#### Who is my HR BP?

Your HR BP is shown as HR-partner on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/).

|  |  | Remuneration |  |  |
|  |  | Policy |  |  |
|  | +-----------------+ |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | ## Сontacts of International Benefits Team |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Please contact us in case of questions <int_benefits@yango.com> |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**Offboarding**|  |
|  |  |  |
|  | To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here are some |  |
|  | information related to offboarding process in Angola.\ |  |
|  | If you have questions regarding offboarding and you have not |  |
|  | found an answer on this page, please reach out to a support team |  |
|  | <https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot> |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**1**Talk to |  |
|  | your [manage |  |
|  | r](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/angola/o |  |
|  | ffboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fangola%2Foffboarding#manager) to |  |
|  | confirm the date of resignation |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**2**[Create a |  |
|  | ticket](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach |  |
|  | your wet-signed [resignation |  |
|  | letter](https://jing.yandex-t |  |
|  | eam.ru/files/annaparchim/resignation%20letter%20template-1.docx) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**3**Provide wet-signed hard copy of the resignation letter to |  |
|  | HR at the office or ask a right |  |
|  | contact [ |  |
|  | Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**4**Finalize pending expense reports |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**5**Return company's assets at the last date |  |
|  |  |  |
|  |**6**Receive final payment and all necessary certificates |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | ## Key Points |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Payment |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Your final payment will be paid with the nearest payroll after |  |
|  | your date of resignation. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, |  |
|  | accrued up until your last day. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Health insurance |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | In case you are eligible Health Insurance Protection, it will |  |
|  | end at the last day of the month of resignation. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Please reach out |  |
|  | to [Helpy](htt |  |
|  | ps://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding |  |
|  | to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Final documentation |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | After the resignation you will receive the final payslip by both |  |
|  | your personal and work email. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Would you need any additional documentation please raise your |  |
|  | request |  |
|  | via [H |  |
|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Workman insurance |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Your life insurance protection will end at the last day of the |  |
|  | month of resignation. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Please reach out |  |
|  | to [Helpy](htt |  |
|  | ps://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding |  |
|  | to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | +-------------------------------------------------------+----+ |  |
|  |  | #### Resignation ticket |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | To create a ticket for your resignation fill in [the |  |  |  |
|  |  | form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/). |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Please specify the date of resignation in the form, |  |  |  |
|  |  | approved by your manager and attach your signed |  |  |  |
|  |  | resignation letter. |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | Please note that standard notice period for |  |  |  |
|  |  | resignation in Angola is 30 calendar days. |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |  |  |
|  |  | A blank for resignation letter you can find in |  |  |  |
|  |  | Documents. |  |  |  |
|  | +=======================================================+====+ |  |
|  | +-------------------------------------------------------+----+ |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Expense reports |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses |  |
|  | before you leave. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Expense report instruction can be |  |
|  | found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/busines |  |
|  | s-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/). |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Please fill in [the |  |
|  | form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach |  |
|  | your resignation letter. The ticket will be automatically |  |
|  | generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any |  |
|  | additional information is needed. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Who is my manager? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Your manager according to organizational chart is shown as Head |  |
|  | on your [Staff](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/). |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Is this possible to receive a reference letter? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | If you need a reference letter, please contact support |  |
|  | via [H |  |
|  | elpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot). |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I receive a Job certificate in English? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | English language is a standard for Job certificate. However, if |  |
|  | you would like to have an addition Job certificate on |  |
|  | Portuguese, please contact support |  |
|  | via [He |  |
|  | lpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a |  |
|  | few days in advance of your resignation date. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### How can I contact HR after the termination date? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Please send an email with your question |  |
|  | on <helpy@yandex-team.ru> |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I buy company's equipment? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | There are some rules. More information |  |
|  | is [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/pokupka/dismissal/). |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Can I get the work certificate? |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Yes, you will get the work certificate not later than your last |  |
|  | working day. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | # Сommittees |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | +-------------------------------------------------------------+ |  |
|  |  | > Here is the information about established Committees in |  |  |
|  |  | > Peru. |  |  |
|  | +=============================================================+ |  |
|  | +-------------------------------------------------------------+ |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Health and Safety Committee |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Validity period: August 1st, 2024 -- July 31st, 2026. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | The main goal of the HSE committee is to coordinate the efforts |  |
|  | of employers and employees to create a safe working environment |  |
|  | and prevent work-related injuries and illnesses. This includes |  |
|  | developing and implementing programs to improve work conditions, |  |
|  | monitoring work conditions in the workplace, conducting regular |  |
|  | inspections of work sites, participating in special assessments |  |
|  | of working conditions, conducting risk assessments, and |  |
|  | investigating incidents and near-miss events. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Members of the committee: |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - The President of the Committee - [Carlos Davis Herrera |  |
|  | Cruz](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/cherrerac) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - The Secretary of the Committee - [Sandra Jeannette Galiano |  |
|  | Rivera](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/sandragaliano) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Representative of the Employees: |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - [Tamayo Izquierdo |  |
|  | Mylene](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/mylenetamayo) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - [Godoy Altamirano Maria |  |
|  | Claudia](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/maclagodoy) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | #### Committee for the Intervention against Sexual Harassment |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Validity period: November 8th, 2024 -- November 7th, 2026. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | This Committee is the body responsible for receiving reports or |  |
|  | complaints of sexual harassment, preparing the pre-qualification |  |
|  | report, and granting protection measures in cases of sexual |  |
|  | harassment, acting in coordination with the Complaints |  |
|  | Investigation team established in HQ. |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Members of the committee: |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - The President of the Committee - [Carlos Davis Herrera |  |
|  | Cruz](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/cherrerac) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - [Sandra Jeannette Galiano |  |
|  | Rivera](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/sandragaliano) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | Representative of the Employees: |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - The Secretary of the Committee - [Diana |  |
|  | Gutierrez](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/dgutierrez) |  |
|  |  |  |
|  | - [Edison Gutierrez](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/edisong) |  |
| +==================================================================+ |
|  |  |  |

   283	| ---------------------------+---+ |  |  |**Health and Safety****What is EHS?**EHS stands for Environment, Health, and Safety. It is a
   284	multidisciplinary field that focuses on managing and ensuring the well-being of individuals and the protection of the environment within
   285	various settings, including workplaces, communities, and public spaces. EHS encompasses a wide range of practices, policies, and regulations
   286	that aim to prevent accidents, injuries, and illnesses while minimizing the negative impact on the environment.
   287	
   288	The primary objectives of EHS are to create safe and healthy working conditions, promote sustainable practices, and comply with legal
   289	requirements to safeguard both employees and the surrounding environment. By integrating these three essential components --
   290	Environment, Health, and Safety -- organizations can proactively identify and mitigate potential hazards, reduce risks, and enhance
   291	overall performance.
   292	
   293	Key aspects of EHS include:
   294	1. Environment: This aspect addresses the impact of human activities on
   295	    the natural world. It involves assessing and managing issues such as air and water quality, waste management, energy efficiency, and the
   296	    conservation of natural resources. By implementing environmentally responsible practices, organizations can contribute to a greener and
   297	    more sustainable future.
   298	2. Health: EHS aims to protect the health and well-being of
   299	    individuals, whether they are employees, customers, or residents of nearby communities. This involves identifying workplace hazards,
   300	    promoting healthy behaviors, providing proper training, and offering access to medical services to prevent and address illnesses and
   301	    injuries.
   302	3. Safety: Safety is a fundamental aspect of EHS, focusing on
   303	    preventing accidents and injuries in various settings. Workplace safety measures can include ergonomic assessments, machine guarding,
   304	    safety training, and emergency preparedness to ensure the physical well-being of employees and visitors.
   305	
   306	Adopting a robust EHS program not only helps organizations maintain a positive reputation but also enhances productivity and efficiency by
   307	reducing downtime due to accidents or environmental incidents. Additionally, it demonstrates a commitment to social responsibility and
   308	sustainability, which is increasingly important in today's world.
   309	
   310	Overall, EHS plays a vital role in maintaining a healthy workforce, protecting the environment, and contributing to the long-term success
   311	and resilience of businesses and communities alike.**Courses**[**Course health safety at work in English**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HESAWORK19)
   312	
   313	[**Course health safety at work in Georgian**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HSEWORK19_GE)
   314	
   315	[**Course health safety at work in Armenian**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HSEWORK19_HY)
   316	
   317	[**Course health safety at work in Spanish**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HSEWORK19_ES)
   318

   326	
   327	[**Covid-19 info course**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/010203)**Risk reduction**Assessment of professional risks
   328	
   329	Identification of hazards: identify potential hazards in the office, including ergonomic issues, electrical malfunctions, and chemical
   330	exposures (detecting all risks related to equipment, environment, or processes).
   331	
   332	Risk Evaluation: analyzing the likelihood and severity of harm from each hazard - use checklists, inspections, and incident reports to assess
   333	risks (Tickets system in Yango).
   334	
   335	Risk reduction measures: developing strategies to minimize risks, such as safety protocols, training, and protective measures as well as
   336	implement engineering controls, administrative policies, and personal protective equipment to mitigate identified risks.
   337	
   338	Risks hunting
   339	
   340	Reporting safety concerns is crucial for maintaining a secure workplace. Employees can promptly identify and report hazards through the HSE
   341	reporting form:
   342	
   343	[  HSE risks hunting (en)](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13704655/)
   344	
   345	This proactive approach helps the HSE team investigate and implement corrective actions, preventing future incidents. Open communication
   346	fosters a culture of safety and ensures timely resolution of issues, protecting everyone in the workplace.
   347	
   348	Near Miss
   349	
   350	Near miss is an unplanned event that didn't result in injury, illness or damage -- but had the potential to do so.
   351	
   352	Hazard communication
   353	
   354	Hazard communication ensures that employees are informed about potential risks in the workplace. Open communication channels allow employees to
   355	report and address hazards promptly.
   356	
   357	By promoting transparency and awareness, hazard communication helps prevent accidents and fosters a safer work environment where everyone
   358	understands and complies with safety protocols.
   359	
   360	Information about risks
   361	
   362	Employees receive timely information about risks through:
   363	- Security guides
   364	- Meetings and trainings
   365	- Information materials in public places
   366	- Wiki pages
   367	- Safety signs
   368	- Briefings
   369	- Documents, tickets and feedback
   370	- Registers with employee signatures
   371	- Feedback channels
   372	
   373	Yango has internally established protocols for quickly informing employees about risks and dangers. In addition, in each country we
   374	organize internal emergency services from volunteers for timely monitoring and management of emergency situations, evacuations and first
   375	aid.
   376	
   377	Please report near miss directly via hse@yango.com**Contacts**If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding health, safety, or environmental issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to
   378	the HSE team.**[Вера Коншина](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/verakonshina) - Head of HSE department**\**[Мария Валиева](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/valievamv) - HSE
   379	specialist**We are here to support you, address your concerns, and help ensure a safe and healthy working environment for everyone.
   380	
   381	Your feedback and observations are invaluable in maintaining a culture of safety and continuous improvement. Let's work together to keep our
   382	workplace safe!\ \**Ergonomics\**The goal of our Ergonomics Program is to improve system and task
   383	design so that safety, health, comfort, and performance is maintained. Many factors play a role in ergonomics. These include body posture and
   384	movement (e.g., sitting, standing, lifting, pulling, and pushing), environmental factors (e.g., noise, vibration, illumination, climate)
   385	and processing of information (i.e., gained visually or through other senses).
   386	
   387	Risk factors include:
   388	- Sustained or awkward body postures
   389	- Excessive repetitive motions
   390	- Excessive or sustained force
   391	- Mechanical or contact stress
   392	- Muscle tension**Prevention is key. Here are some suggestions and tools to help you
   393	avoid ergonomic issues:**- [Ergonomic Guidelines for Setting up Your Computer Workstation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F8_ME4VwTiw)
   394	- [Office Ergonomics: Simple solutions for comfort and
   395	  safety](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofnpBtO1-gA)
   396	- [Ergonomics wrist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTSuhjpSLHg)
   397	- [Ergonomics Shoulder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vNbBCGgfe8)
   398	- [Ergonomics Neck](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fa4SFs85too)
   399	
   400	Remember to report any symptoms such as soreness, stiffness, burning, aching, numbness or weakness to your manager or to the EHS department.
   401	If you are uncomfortable for any reason, ask for help.

| ---------------------------+---+ |  |  |**Health and Safety****What is EHS?**EHS stands for Environment, Health, and Safety. It is a
multidisciplinary field that focuses on managing and ensuring the well-being of individuals and the protection of the environment within
various settings, including workplaces, communities, and public spaces. EHS encompasses a wide range of practices, policies, and regulations
that aim to prevent accidents, injuries, and illnesses while minimizing the negative impact on the environment.

The primary objectives of EHS are to create safe and healthy working conditions, promote sustainable practices, and comply with legal
requirements to safeguard both employees and the surrounding environment. By integrating these three essential components --
Environment, Health, and Safety -- organizations can proactively identify and mitigate potential hazards, reduce risks, and enhance
overall performance.

Key aspects of EHS include:
1. Environment: This aspect addresses the impact of human activities on
    the natural world. It involves assessing and managing issues such as air and water quality, waste management, energy efficiency, and the
    conservation of natural resources. By implementing environmentally responsible practices, organizations can contribute to a greener and
    more sustainable future.
2. Health: EHS aims to protect the health and well-being of
    individuals, whether they are employees, customers, or residents of nearby communities. This involves identifying workplace hazards,
    promoting healthy behaviors, providing proper training, and offering access to medical services to prevent and address illnesses and
    injuries.
3. Safety: Safety is a fundamental aspect of EHS, focusing on
    preventing accidents and injuries in various settings. Workplace safety measures can include ergonomic assessments, machine guarding,
    safety training, and emergency preparedness to ensure the physical well-being of employees and visitors.

Adopting a robust EHS program not only helps organizations maintain a positive reputation but also enhances productivity and efficiency by
reducing downtime due to accidents or environmental incidents. Additionally, it demonstrates a commitment to social responsibility and
sustainability, which is increasingly important in today's world.

Overall, EHS plays a vital role in maintaining a healthy workforce, protecting the environment, and contributing to the long-term success
and resilience of businesses and communities alike.**Courses**[**Course health safety at work in English**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HESAWORK19)

[**Course health safety at work in Georgian**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/HSEWORK19_GE)

[**Covid-19 info course**](https://quantum.yandex-team.ru/courses/010203)**Risk reduction**Assessment of professional risks

Identification of hazards: identify potential hazards in the office, including ergonomic issues, electrical malfunctions, and chemical
exposures (detecting all risks related to equipment, environment, or processes).

Risk Evaluation: analyzing the likelihood and severity of harm from each hazard - use checklists, inspections, and incident reports to assess
risks (Tickets system in Yango).

Risk reduction measures: developing strategies to minimize risks, such as safety protocols, training, and protective measures as well as
implement engineering controls, administrative policies, and personal protective equipment to mitigate identified risks.

Risks hunting

Reporting safety concerns is crucial for maintaining a secure workplace. Employees can promptly identify and report hazards through the HSE
reporting form:

[  HSE risks hunting (en)](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13704655/)

This proactive approach helps the HSE team investigate and implement corrective actions, preventing future incidents. Open communication
fosters a culture of safety and ensures timely resolution of issues, protecting everyone in the workplace.

Near Miss

Near miss is an unplanned event that didn't result in injury, illness or damage -- but had the potential to do so.

Hazard communication

Hazard communication ensures that employees are informed about potential risks in the workplace. Open communication channels allow employees to
report and address hazards promptly.

By promoting transparency and awareness, hazard communication helps prevent accidents and fosters a safer work environment where everyone
understands and complies with safety protocols.

Information about risks

Employees receive timely information about risks through:
- Security guides
- Meetings and trainings
- Information materials in public places
- Wiki pages
- Safety signs
- Briefings
- Documents, tickets and feedback
- Registers with employee signatures
- Feedback channels

Yango has internally established protocols for quickly informing employees about risks and dangers. In addition, in each country we
organize internal emergency services from volunteers for timely monitoring and management of emergency situations, evacuations and first
aid.

Please report near miss directly via hse@yango.com**Contacts**If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding health, safety, or environmental issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to
the HSE team.**[Вера Коншина](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/verakonshina) - Head of HSE department**\**[Мария Валиева](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/valievamv) - HSE
specialist**We are here to support you, address your concerns, and help ensure a safe and healthy working environment for everyone.

Your feedback and observations are invaluable in maintaining a culture of safety and continuous improvement. Let's work together to keep our
workplace safe!\ \**Ergonomics\**The goal of our Ergonomics Program is to improve system and task
design so that safety, health, comfort, and performance is maintained. Many factors play a role in ergonomics. These include body posture and
movement (e.g., sitting, standing, lifting, pulling, and pushing), environmental factors (e.g., noise, vibration, illumination, climate)
and processing of information (i.e., gained visually or through other senses).

Risk factors include:
- Sustained or awkward body postures
- Excessive repetitive motions
- Excessive or sustained force
- Mechanical or contact stress
- Muscle tension**Prevention is key. Here are some suggestions and tools to help you
avoid ergonomic issues:**- [Ergonomic Guidelines for Setting up Your Computer Workstation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F8_ME4VwTiw)
- [Office Ergonomics: Simple solutions for comfort and
  safety](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofnpBtO1-gA)
- [Ergonomics wrist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTSuhjpSLHg)
- [Ergonomics Shoulder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vNbBCGgfe8)
- [Ergonomics Neck](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fa4SFs85too)

Remember to report any symptoms such as soreness, stiffness, burning, aching, numbness or weakness to your manager or to the EHS department.
If you are uncomfortable for any reason, ask for help.
