# Region: MENAP, Country: Morocco, Topic: Travel

This document provides information about business travel policies, per diem rates, and travel allowances for employees in Morocco.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: Morocco
topic: Travel
---

country: Morocco topic: Travel
- Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem
(daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to, and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and
two taxi rides.

To have the refund of expenses related to the business trip, it is necessary to apply in the Expensify platform expense reports with the
bills, in case the business trip is out of the country, or the invoices with the name of the legal entity, in case the business trip is inside
Morocco.**General rules**Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

To issue a TRAVEL request go to <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>
1. Create a TRAVEL ticket
- Apply for a business trip via special [form in service
  Y.Trip.](https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/)
- Travel ticket with a status "Open" will be created automatically in
  addition to the application.
- Purchasing of all services is managed via Y.Trip. After the approval
  process is completed you need to add all the services on the main page of your application in Y.Trip and click the yellow button "Book
  all".
- Any question during the process can be asked in the support chat
  through the yellow button "Ask a question". If for some reason the support chat didn't start, then you need to link your personal Yandex
  account to the Staff and the button will appear.
- If you mark "External Conference" as a purpose of your business trip
  you will see a special form for comments -- please specify all details. Thus you will have two tickets: TRAVEL and INTERCONF. You
  should buy a ticket to the conference yourself using your personal or corporate card. The Conference group will coordinate you in case you
  need help in purchasing a ticket for the conference. Please address all questions about conference in the INTERCONF ticket.
- If you are going on a business trip the first time please see the
  detailed [instruction.](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/anngolovina/Instruction.docx)
2. Trip approval
- Your immediate superior will be automatically invited to approve the
  trip. If you are going abroad, the superior manager will also be automatically invited to approve.
- After the approval process the status of your application will be
  changed to "approved". Please wait to finalise approval process before you start booking tickets and hotel.
3. Travel policy: tickets, hotels, etc.

You can choose options according to our travel policy.

Flights:**Economy:**\ Select an economy class flight that's not over 50% more expensive than
the cheapest results shown, and complies with the following conditions:
- If direct, the flight is not with a low-cost airline, and includes
one item of luggage plus hand luggage.\
- If indirect, the flight has as few connections as possible and
avoids countries with visa requirements (e.g. the Shengen zone or the USA). It must also not be with a low-cost airline, and include one item
of luggage plus hand luggage.**Comfort:**longer than 6 hours

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting**Business:**only for segment longer than 8 hours (connection flights don't count)

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting}\>**Railway tickets**Compartment in night trains; economy and comfort seats in speed trains**Transfer**You can have a prepaid transfer to and from an airport/railway station
in the city of departure and in the city of your business trip. It can be arranged by the agency or by yourself (reimbursable)**Car rental**Accepted in USA, Finland, Israel, Uzbekistan.\
The use of a personal car for domestic business trips is not recommended.**Visa**Please contact the consulate of the country you are travelling to or a
local visa services providers in good time before your planned date of travel.\
If you need any assistance, please inform us in the ticket.**Per Diem**----------------------------------------------------------------------- Morocco                             65**\$/per day**----------------------------------- -----------------------------------

  -----------------------------------------------------------------------**Change/cancel trip, make report****Report**- Colleagues from the HR department will close the ticket themselves as
  soon as they make the payment for daily allowance.
- If you buy tickets or book a hotel for a business trip at your own
  expense you should create expense report via [special form.](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/170915/) and attach
  receipts for reimbursement.
- If you paid for conference ticket using your personal or corporate
  card, you must also add it to the report to get reimbursement.

You don`t have to report on services bought via the agency.**Cancellation**Click the "Cancel my trip" button in Y.Trip. You will receive information on cancellation penalties in the support chat.

In case of cancellation for a valid reason (illness, cancellation at the company's initiative, cancellation of an event or meetings with
partners, etc.) no penalties will be applied on you. In other cases the withholding of penalties will be agreed with your HR partner.**Change of dates**If you need to change the dates of the trip, then you need:
- approve it with your Manager in the Travel Ticket and after that click
  on the "Change travel dates" button on the top right corner of the page in your application in Y.Trip;
- send a message to the support chat and ask to change the ticket and/or
  hotel booking and wait for the answer.**Change of services**If you need to change services without changing the dates, then you need:
- get confirmation from your Manager in the Travel Ticket;
- send a message to the support chat about the necessary change, they
  will inform you about penalties.

After your confirmation the agency will make changes and send new tickets/hotel voucher to the Ticket.

# Region: MENAP, Country: Oman, Topic: Health Safety and Environmental

This document outlines the Environment, Health, and Safety (EHS) policies and procedures for employees in Oman.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: Oman
topic: Health Safety And Environmental
---

country: Oman topic: Health Safety And Environmental
-**What is EHS?**EHS stands for Environment, Health, and Safety. It is a
multidisciplinary field that focuses on managing and ensuring the well-being of individuals and the protection of the environment within
various settings, including workplaces, communities, and public spaces. EHS encompasses a wide range of practices, policies, and regulations
that aim to prevent accidents, injuries, and illnesses while minimizing the negative impact on the environment.

The primary objectives of EHS are to create safe and healthy working conditions, promote sustainable practices, and comply with legal
requirements to safeguard both employees and the surrounding environment. By integrating these three essential components --
Environment, Health, and Safety -- organizations can proactively identify and mitigate potential hazards, reduce risks, and enhance
overall performance.**Key aspects of EHS include:**1. Environment: This aspect addresses the impact of human activities on the natural world. It involves assessing and managing issues such as
    air and water quality, waste management, energy efficiency, and the conservation of natural resources. By implementing environmentally
    responsible practices, organizations can contribute to a greener and more sustainable future.
2. Health: EHS aims to protect the health and well-being of
    individuals, whether they are employees, customers, or residents of nearby communities. This involves identifying workplace hazards,
    promoting healthy behaviors, providing proper training, and offering access to medical services to prevent and address illnesses and
    injuries.
3. Safety: Safety is a fundamental aspect of EHS, focusing on
    preventing accidents and injuries in various settings. Workplace safety measures can include ergonomic assessments, machine guarding,
    safety training, and emergency preparedness to ensure the physical well-being of employees and visitors.

Adopting a robust EHS program not only helps organizations maintain a positive reputation but also enhances productivity and efficiency by
reducing downtime due to accidents or environmental incidents. Additionally, it demonstrates a commitment to social responsibility and
sustainability, which is increasingly important in today's world.

Overall, EHS plays a vital role in maintaining a healthy workforce, protecting the environment, and contributing to the long-term success
and resilience of businesses and communities alike.**Risk Reduction****Assessment of professional risks****Identification of hazards:**identify potential hazards in the office, including ergonomic issues, electrical malfunctions, and chemical
exposures (detecting all risks related to equipment, environment, or processes).**Risk Evaluation:**analyzing the likelihood and severity of harm from
each hazard - use checklists, inspections, and incident reports to assess risks (Tickets system in Yango).**Risk reduction measures:**developing strategies to minimize risks,
such as safety protocols, training, and protective measures as well as implement engineering controls, administrative policies, and personal
protective equipment to mitigate identified risks.**Risks hunting**Reporting safety concerns is crucial for maintaining a secure workplace. Employees can promptly identify and report hazards through the HSE
reporting form: [HSE risks hunting (en)](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13704655/).

This proactive approach helps the HSE team investigate and implement corrective actions, preventing future incidents. Open communication
fosters a culture of safety and ensures timely resolution of issues, protecting everyone in the workplace.**Near Miss**Near miss is an unplanned event that didn't result in injury, illness or
damage -- but had the potential to do so.**Hazard communication**Hazard communication ensures that employees are informed about potential risks in the workplace. Open communication channels allow employees to
report and address hazards promptly.

By promoting transparency and awareness, hazard communication helps prevent accidents and fosters a safer work environment where everyone
understands and complies with safety protocols.**Information about risks**Employees receive timely information about risks through:
- Security guides
- Meetings and trainings
- Information materials in public places
- Wiki pages
- Safety signs
- Briefings
- Documents, tickets and feedback
- Registers with employee signatures
- Feedback channels

Yango has internally established protocols for quickly informing employees about risks and dangers. In addition, in each country we
organize internal emergency services from volunteers for timely monitoring and management of emergency situations, evacuations and first
aid.

Please report near miss directly via hse@yango.com**Ergonomics**The goal of our Ergonomics Program is to improve system and task design so that safety, health, comfort, and performance is maintained. Many
factors play a role in ergonomics. These include body posture and movement (e.g., sitting, standing, lifting, pulling, and pushing),
environmental factors (e.g., noise, vibration, illumination, climate) and processing of information (i.e., gained visually or through other
senses).**Risk factors include:**- Sustained or awkward body postures
- Excessive repetitive motions
- Excessive or sustained force
- Mechanical or contact stress
- Muscle tension**Prevention is key. Here are some suggestions and tools to help you
avoid ergonomic issues:**- [Ergonomic Guidelines for Setting up Your Computer Workstation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F8_ME4VwTiw)
- [Office Ergonomics: Simple solutions for comfort and
  safety](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofnpBtO1-gA)
- [Ergonomics wrist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTSuhjpSLHg)
- [Ergonomics Shoulder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vNbBCGgfe8)
- [Ergonomics Neck](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fa4SFs85too)

Remember to report any symptoms such as soreness, stiffness, burning, aching, numbness or weakness to your manager or to the EHS department.
If you are uncomfortable for any reason, ask for help.**HSE Team**If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding health, safety, or environmental issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to
the HSE team.

[Vera Konshina](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/verakonshina)**- Head of HSE department**\
[Mariia Valieva****](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/valievamv)**- HSE specialist**We are here to support you, address your concerns, and help ensure a
safe and healthy working environment for everyone.

Your feedback and observations are invaluable in maintaining a culture of safety and continuous improvement. Let's work together to keep our
workplace safe!

country: Oman topic: Offboarding
- To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here is some information
related to offboarding process.
1. Talk
    to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/dubai/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fdubai%2Foffboarding#who-is-my-manager) to notify about termination and agree on the termination date
2. [Create a ticket ](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/)and
    attach your [resignation letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/irina-tsekh/Resignation%20letter%20sample.docx),
    get it approved by your manager
3. Sign needed papers regarding termination and visa/work permit
    cancellation provided by HR Admin
4. Finalize pending expense reports
5. Return company's assets on the last day
6. Receive final payment and all necessary certificates**Key Points****Payment**Your final payment will be made maximum 10 days after the date
of resignation.

We will pay your salary and all the benefits you are entitled, accrued up until your last day.

Do not hesitate to reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) for
any questions regarding the payroll.**Health insurance**For the Health Insurance Protection, it will end at the last working day.

Please reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) regarding
to your insurance details, or to answer any of your questions.**Final documentation**At your last working day of work you will receive the following documentation by both your personal and work mail:
- Final payment
- Work Certificate

####**Resignation ticket**To create a ticket for your resignation, please fill
the [form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/).

Please specify the date of resignation in the form, approved by your manager, and attach your signed resignation letter. We ask you to apply
for resignation 3 business days in advance.

A blank for resignation letter you can find in Documents.**Expense reports**You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.**How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?**Please fill the [form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach a screenshot of your resignation letter. The ticket will
be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.**Can I receive a Job certificate in English?**Please contact a support team
via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) a few days in advance of your resignation date.**How can I contact HR after the termination date?**Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

-**Salary**Salary payment is once a month, it is paid at the last business day, and
sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier.

If you have any doubts about received amounts you can always raise your question
via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).**Social contributions**According to the terms outlined in the employment contract, the company covers the 8% social contribution.**Reimbursement**Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs.
When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant who makes such payments within payroll period.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.**How can I update my bank details in systems?**Please fill out [this form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/160874/) to change your bank
details.**How was my KPI bonus calculated?**The amount of your bonuses is given by your manager and approved by your HR BP, so that we would recommend you contact them accordingly. If you
still have doubts, please reach out to support team via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

country: Oman topic: Psychological Support
- People, their physical and mental wellbeing, have always been at the
core of Yango. To create a comfortable environment where everyone feels looked after, we are offering a psychological support program for all
our employees across all our locations around the world.

[TELUS Health](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.telushealth.com/) (formely
LifeWorks) is a well-known and respected corporate support provider with over 50 years of experience offering technology-driven employee care and
HR services around the world.

TELUS Health service is free for company employees and available to everyone starting from their first day, including those on their
probation period.

All information related to your participation in the TELUS Health support program is strictly confidential. No information will be shared
with anyone without your informed, voluntary and written consent.

TELUS Health' support service can help you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Strengthen relationships and improve communication
- Deal with stress, anxiety and depression
- Resolve personal and emotional difficulties
- Address marital and relationship difficulties
- Understand grief and bereavement
- Find solutions for work-related issues
- Work towards life goals
- Cope with isolation and loneliness
- Adapt across cultures
- Identify and cope with culture shock
- Access crisis and trauma support**How many sessions are available?**| ---**5 sessions per issue**(unlimited number of issues per year) in |

# Region: MENAP, Country: Oman, Topic: Time Off

This document provides information about vacation planning, time off requests, and absence management for employees in Oman.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: Oman
topic: Time Off
---

country: Oman topic: Time Off
-**How to**Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

Specify your time off at the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/) on Staff. For vacation set
it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/)

A few days before your planned time off starts, HR admin will contact you via the ticket to attach necessary documents, if needed

Time off will be considered in payroll of the month in which it is taken. Please make sure you provided all requested documentation**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 30 days of annual leave, after completing
six months of continuous service.

The scheduling of these holidays should be a balance between the needs of the employee and the operational requirements of the company.

These periods can be divided according to the requirement of the work interest.

The worker shall go on leave at least for a period of two weeks once every two years.

Unused vacation may be carried forward in amount of 30 days.**Unpaid leave**According to the article number 61, the employer may grant the worker, based on his request, special leave without pay, and in this case, the
worker must bear all contributions to the Social Protection Fund covering his percentage, the percentage of the employer, and the
percentage of the government during the leave period. This leave is considered within the period of service of the worker and this period is
not counted in the calculation of the end-of-service gratuity.

According to article 83 of Oman labor law, it's also permitted to grant female worker based on her request leave without pay to care for her
child for a period not exceeding 1 year, and she will bear all contributions for social protection funds.**Sick leave**According to article of 82, the worker, whose illness is proven, is
entitled to a sick leave not exceeding 182 days a year based on the following percentages of the gross wage:
- From day 1 to day 21: 100% of the wage;
- From day 22 to day 35: 75% of the wage;
- From day 36 to day 70: 50% of the wage;
- From day 71 to day 182: 35% of the wage.**Other paid leaves**The employee is entitled to special paid leave with as follows:
- 3 days in the event of employee's marriage;
- 3 days in the event of the death of the father, mother, grandfather,
  grandmother, brother, or sister;
- 2 days in the event of the death of the paternal uncle or aunt or the
  maternal uncle or aunt;
- 10 days in the event of the death of the wife, a son, or a daughter;
- 15 days to perform hajj throughout the period of employee's service,
  provided that the worker has spent a continuous period of 1 year in the service of the employer;
- Maximum 15 days per year to take an exam for the omani worker who
  studies;
- 130 for the muslim female worker in the event of the death of the
  husband and 14 days for the non-muslim woman;
- 15 days for the omani worker to accompany a patient with whom he has a
  marital relationship up to the second degree.**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take one of these types of leave, please raise a ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to
organize childcare leaves.**Maternity leave**In Oman, maternity leave period is 98 days, shall be entitled leave to cover the period prior to childbirth on the recommendation of the
competent medical body, with a maximum term of 14 days, and the balance of the period of this leave shall be granted from the day of childbirth.**Paternity leave**7 days of paternity leave, provided that the child is born alive and
that the leave does not exceed the 98th day of the age of the child.**How can I get access to Absence Planner?**Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you access to the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/).**I was sick, but I don't have a medical certificate.**Medical confirmation is required in order that those absences are not
considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss your absence and the better way to fill this absence.**What happens if my manager didn't approve my vacation?**This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make
sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.**Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?**Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.

Уour vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month. Also,
on Staff you will see only integral numbers. It means that sometimes you will see a lower number of available vacation days than it is in fact.**Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?**You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4.

To cancel you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

# Region: MENAP, Country: Oman, Topic: Travel

This document provides information about business travel policies, per diem rates, and travel allowances for employees in Oman.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: Oman
topic: Travel
---

country: Oman topic: Travel
- Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem
(daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to, and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and
two taxi rides.

For the per diems it is necessary to send all the expenses proofs to your HR Admin to be registered.

Other reimbursements are possible only by creating "Money to work" ticket.

The bills and invoices need to have the amount, date and the description of the purchase. It is not allowed to refund alcohol, souvenirs or
entertainment expenses.**How to organise business trip for the employees of UAE office****General rules**Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

To issue a TRAVEL request go to <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>
1. Create a TRAVEL ticket
- Apply for a business trip via special [form in service
  Y.Trip.](https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/)
- Travel ticket with a status "Open" will be created automatically in
  addition to the application.
- Purchasing of all services is managed via Y.Trip. After the approval
  process is completed you need to add all the services on the main page of your application in Y.Trip and click the yellow button "Book
  all".
- Any question during the process can be asked in the support chat
  through the yellow button "Ask a question". If for some reason the support chat didn't start, then you need to link your personal Yandex
  account to the Staff and the button will appear.
- If you mark "External Conference" as a purpose of your business trip
  you will see a special form for comments -- please specify all details. Thus you will have two tickets: TRAVEL and INTERCONF. You
  should buy a ticket to the conference yourself using your personal or corporate card. The Conference group will coordinate you in case you
  need help in purchasing a ticket for the conference. Please address all questions about conference in the INTERCONF ticket.
- If you are going on a business trip the first time please see the
  detailed [instruction.](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/anngolovina/Instruction.docx)
2. Trip approval
- Your immediate superior will be automatically invited to approve the
  trip. If you are going abroad, the superior manager will also be automatically invited to approve.
- After the approval process the status of your application will be
  changed to "approved". Please wait to finalise approval process before you start booking tickets and hotel.
3. Travel policy: tickets, hotels, etc.

You can choose options according to our travel policy.

Flights:**Economy:**\ Select an economy class flight that's not over 50% more expensive than
the cheapest results shown, and complies with the following conditions:
- If direct, the flight is not with a low-cost airline, and includes
one item of luggage plus hand luggage.\
- If indirect, the flight has as few connections as possible and
avoids countries with visa requirements (e.g. the Shengen zone or the USA). It must also not be with a low-cost airline, and include one item
of luggage plus hand luggage.**Comfort:**longer than 6 hours

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting**Business:**only for segment longer than 8 hours (connection flights don't count)

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting}\>**Railway tickets**Compartment in night trains; economy and comfort seats in speed trains**Transfer**You can have a prepaid transfer to and from an airport/railway station
in the city of departure and in the city of your business trip. It can be arranged by the agency or by yourself (reimbursable)**Car rental**Accepted in USA, Finland, Israel, Uzbekistan.\
The use of a personal car for domestic business trips is not recommended.**Visa**Please contact the consulate of the country you are travelling to or a
local visa services providers in good time before your planned date of travel.\
If you need any assistance, please inform us in the ticket.**Per Diem**Oman - 50 \$/per day**Change/cancel trip, make report****Report**- Colleagues from the HR department will close the ticket themselves as soon as they make the payment for daily allowance.
- If you buy tickets or book a hotel for a business trip at your own
  expense you should create expense report via [special form.](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/170915/) and attach
  receipts for reimbursement.
- If you paid for conference ticket using your personal or corporate
  card, you must also add it to the report to get reimbursement.

You don`t have to report on services bought via the agency.**Cancellation**Click the "Cancel my trip" button in Y.Trip. You will receive information on cancellation penalties in the support chat.

In case of cancellation for a valid reason (illness, cancellation at the company's initiative, cancellation of an event or meetings with
partners, etc.) no penalties will be applied on you. In other cases the withholding of penalties will be agreed with your HR partner.**Change of dates**If you need to change the dates of the trip, then you need:
- approve it with your Manager in the Travel Ticket and after that click
  on the "Change travel dates" button on the top right corner of the page in your application in Y.Trip;
- send a message to the support chat and ask to change the ticket and/or
  hotel booking and wait for the answer.**Change of services**If you need to change services without changing the dates, then you need:
- get confirmation from your Manager in the Travel Ticket;
- send a message to the support chat about the necessary change, they
  will inform you about penalties.

After your confirmation the agency will make changes and send new tickets/hotel voucher to the Ticket.

country: UAE topic: Consolidated Allowance
- Location Consolidated Allowance

Yango provides consolidated allowance to employees who permanently present and work in the UAE.

Location Consolidated Allowance at Yango includes all types of allowances (housing, transportation, education, home leave). The amount
of the allowance depends on employee's grade.

Rules for granting the allowance

An employee shoud submit a soft copy of his/her Ejari/tenancy contract to the company within the first 30 days after the date of his/her
employment. In case the contract is signed by the spouse it is necessary to provide it along with the marriage certificate.

If the tenancy agreement is not provided (or it has expired) and the employee leaves the country for more than 30 consecutive days the
Company has the right to suspend allowance payment for the period of employee's actual absence.

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Topic: Health Safety and Environmental

This document outlines the Environment, Health, and Safety (EHS) policies and procedures for employees in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Health Safety And Environmental
---

country: UAE topic: Health Safety And Environmental
-**What is EHS?**EHS stands for Environment, Health, and Safety. It is a
multidisciplinary field that focuses on managing and ensuring the well-being of individuals and the protection of the environment within
various settings, including workplaces, communities, and public spaces. EHS encompasses a wide range of practices, policies, and regulations
that aim to prevent accidents, injuries, and illnesses while minimizing the negative impact on the environment.

The primary objectives of EHS are to create safe and healthy working conditions, promote sustainable practices, and comply with legal
requirements to safeguard both employees and the surrounding environment. By integrating these three essential components --
Environment, Health, and Safety -- organizations can proactively identify and mitigate potential hazards, reduce risks, and enhance
overall performance.**Key aspects of EHS include:**1. Environment: This aspect addresses the impact of human activities on the natural world. It involves assessing and managing issues such as
    air and water quality, waste management, energy efficiency, and the conservation of natural resources. By implementing environmentally
    responsible practices, organizations can contribute to a greener and more sustainable future.
2. Health: EHS aims to protect the health and well-being of
    individuals, whether they are employees, customers, or residents of nearby communities. This involves identifying workplace hazards,
    promoting healthy behaviors, providing proper training, and offering access to medical services to prevent and address illnesses and
    injuries.
3. Safety: Safety is a fundamental aspect of EHS, focusing on
    preventing accidents and injuries in various settings. Workplace safety measures can include ergonomic assessments, machine guarding,
    safety training, and emergency preparedness to ensure the physical well-being of employees and visitors.

Adopting a robust EHS program not only helps organizations maintain a positive reputation but also enhances productivity and efficiency by
reducing downtime due to accidents or environmental incidents. Additionally, it demonstrates a commitment to social responsibility and
sustainability, which is increasingly important in today's world.

Overall, EHS plays a vital role in maintaining a healthy workforce, protecting the environment, and contributing to the long-term success
and resilience of businesses and communities alike.**Risk Reduction****Assessment of professional risks****Identification of hazards:**identify potential hazards in the office, including ergonomic issues, electrical malfunctions, and chemical
exposures (detecting all risks related to equipment, environment, or processes).**Risk Evaluation:**analyzing the likelihood and severity of harm from
each hazard - use checklists, inspections, and incident reports to assess risks (Tickets system in Yango).**Risk reduction measures:**developing strategies to minimize risks,
such as safety protocols, training, and protective measures as well as implement engineering controls, administrative policies, and personal
protective equipment to mitigate identified risks.**Risks hunting**Reporting safety concerns is crucial for maintaining a secure workplace. Employees can promptly identify and report hazards through the HSE
reporting form: [HSE risks hunting (en)](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13704655/).

This proactive approach helps the HSE team investigate and implement corrective actions, preventing future incidents. Open communication
fosters a culture of safety and ensures timely resolution of issues, protecting everyone in the workplace.**Near Miss**Near miss is an unplanned event that didn't result in injury, illness or
damage -- but had the potential to do so.**Hazard communication**Hazard communication ensures that employees are informed about potential risks in the workplace. Open communication channels allow employees to
report and address hazards promptly.

By promoting transparency and awareness, hazard communication helps prevent accidents and fosters a safer work environment where everyone
understands and complies with safety protocols.**Information about risks**Employees receive timely information about risks through:
- Security guides
- Meetings and trainings
- Information materials in public places
- Wiki pages
- Safety signs
- Briefings
- Documents, tickets and feedback
- Registers with employee signatures
- Feedback channels

Yango has internally established protocols for quickly informing employees about risks and dangers. In addition, in each country we
organize internal emergency services from volunteers for timely monitoring and management of emergency situations, evacuations and first
aid.

Please report near miss directly via hse@yango.com**Ergonomics**The goal of our Ergonomics Program is to improve system and task design so that safety, health, comfort, and performance is maintained. Many
factors play a role in ergonomics. These include body posture and movement (e.g., sitting, standing, lifting, pulling, and pushing),
environmental factors (e.g., noise, vibration, illumination, climate) and processing of information (i.e., gained visually or through other
senses).**Risk factors include:**- Sustained or awkward body postures
- Excessive repetitive motions
- Excessive or sustained force
- Mechanical or contact stress
- Muscle tension**Prevention is key. Here are some suggestions and tools to help you
avoid ergonomic issues:**- [Ergonomic Guidelines for Setting up Your Computer Workstation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F8_ME4VwTiw)
- [Office Ergonomics: Simple solutions for comfort and
  safety](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofnpBtO1-gA)
- [Ergonomics wrist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OTSuhjpSLHg)
- [Ergonomics Shoulder](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vNbBCGgfe8)
- [Ergonomics Neck](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fa4SFs85too)

Remember to report any symptoms such as soreness, stiffness, burning, aching, numbness or weakness to your manager or to the EHS department.
If you are uncomfortable for any reason, ask for help.**HSE Team**If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding health, safety, or environmental issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to
the HSE team.

[Vera Konshina](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/verakonshina)**- Head of HSE department**\
[Mariia Valieva****](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/valievamv)**- HSE specialist**We are here to support you, address your concerns, and help ensure a
safe and healthy working environment for everyone.

Your feedback and observations are invaluable in maintaining a culture of safety and continuous improvement. Let's work together to keep our
workplace safe!

- Medical insurance is provided to full-time employees in Yango's UAE
legal entity in accordance with the corporate rules. The insurance program covers planned and emergency medical care services.**Insurance Company**Cigna**Insurance period**01.03.2025 --- 28.02.2026**Insurance rules\
1.**The policy is updated at the beginning of the insurance period, on
the 1st of March annually.\ You will be notified through the corporate mailing.**2.**Changing the legal entity within the Yango group and subsequent
visa renewal doesn't impact the insurance.**Plan details****Consultations and procedures**| 👩🏻‍⚕️ Doctors visits / Out-patient |  |

01.03.2025 to 28.02.2026. The limit is fixed regardless of the start
date.**Prevention**🔎 Check-up limited by AED 1 000 per year

💉 Travel vaccination**Mental health**👩🏻‍⚕️ Psychiatric help: outpatient, inpatient and emergency coverage limited by AED 10 000 per year

👨‍⚕️ Mental health services through online services Yasno and Zigmund (sessions in Russian), details
are**[here.**](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/kompensacii/straxovanie/dms-dlja-sotrudnikov/psixoterapevticheskaja-pomoshh-po-dms/online/)

👨‍⚕️ Mental health services through online service Telus Health (sessions in English and Arabic), details
are**[here**](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/HR/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%B8/psychological-support/)**Inpatient treatment**🚑 Emergency and planned hospitalization\
- Day Hospital\
- Instrumental Researches (X-ray, ultrasound, endoscopic)\
- Intensive care\
- Laboratory diagnostics\
- Day Hospital\
- Prescribed Drugs & Medicines\
- Pre-existing & Chronic Conditions\
- Ambulance\
- Organ transplantation\
- Surgical Treatment and anesthesia**Family planning**🚑 Maternity (out-patient and in-patient treatment)**How to use your insurance program?**Medical insurance is activated within 14 days after the signing of the
employment contract.

An electronic insurance policy, a memo with a description of the program, as well as a search for clinics and an option for submitting
documents for reimbursement are available on the [Cigna online portal](https://smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae/), or Mobile
App [IOS](https://apps.apple.com/ae/app/smartcare-by-cigna/id1539707940), [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id%3Dcom.neuron.cigna%26pli%3D1). An electronic policy and instructions are sent by e-mail.

##### Medical care within the network

1\. Make an appointment in a clinic [within the network](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/nepoklonnova/NetworkList%20Open%201.xlsx/)

2\. Provide Emirates ID (EID) at the reception.

3\. Clinic staff will see the plan details and coverage.

4\. When prescribing research/analysis, the doctor contacts the insurance company, claim number is displayed in the app and comes in a
text message. If the claim is not agreed within 15 minutes, you would be booked for a second appointment.**5. If you are told in a clinic that you are not insured, do not agree
to pay for the appointment yourself and call the insurance company.**In case of SLA non-compliance or refusal to approve the service please contact insurance broker Toma Nikitina, +971 55 606
1771, [Telegram](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/tomanikitina), <tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae>**Medical care outside the network**Medical services provided outside the network are paid by the employees themselves. 100% of expenses are reimbursed by the insurance company.
Details are [below](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/hr/compensation-and-benefits-department/cnb-international/xaby/benefity-v-oaje/straxovanie-v-oaje/insurance-uae/#reimbursement%20%5Creimbursemente/) .

Reimbursement SLA -- 15 working days.

There is a discount for Yango employees in clinics outside the network with Russian-speaking doctors:
- [Kandinsky](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://kandinskyclinic.com/) (20%
  discount with promo code YANGO20, please specify that you are Yango employee)

If any questions please write [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://telegram.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) .

You can always apply to the insurance broker Toma Nikitina, +971 55 606 1771, [Telegram](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/tomanikitina), [tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae](mailto:tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae) (available
at non-working time, on weekends and holidays. Better call in case of emergency).**Approval SLAs**- Diagnostics: laboratory exams, instrumental researches (x-ray,
ultrasound, endoscopic etc) -- during 1 hour
- Referral to another specialist -- doesn't need additional approval
- Prescribed medicine -- during 1 hour
- Services above AED 500 -- during 1 hour.

In case of SLA non-compliance or refusal to approve the service please contact insurance broker Toma Nikitina, +971 55 606
1771, [Telegram](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/tomanikitina), <tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae>

Medical services provided outside the network are paid by the employees themselves. Expenses are reimbursed by 100% of actuals. Details are
below.

Reimbursement SLA -- 15 working days.

If any questions please write to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://telegram.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) .

You can always apply to the insurance broker Toma Nikitina, +971 55 606 1771, [Telegram](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/tomanikitina), [tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae](mailto:tamara.nikitina@malakut.ae) (in
touch at non-working time, on weekends and holidays. It's better to call if something urgent)

#####

##### In case of planned in-patient care (hospitalization)

Approval SLA:
- Planned hospitalization / operative treatment / delivery care --
during 3 days.

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Topic: Offboarding

This document provides information about the offboarding process for employees leaving the company in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Offboarding
---

country: UAE topic: Offboarding
- To ensure a smooth transition before you leave, here is some information
related to offboarding process.

Talk to your [manager](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/employees/country-guides/dubai/offboarding/?from=%2Femployees%2Fdubai%2Foffboarding#who-is-my-manager) to notify
about termination and agree on the termination date

[Create a ticket ](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/)and attach your [resignation
letter](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/irina-tsekh/Resignation%20letter%20sample.docx), get it approved by your manager

Sign needed papers regarding termination and visa/work permit cancellation provided by HR Admin

Finalize pending expense reports

Return company's assets on the last day

Receive final payment**Key Points**Payment

Your final payment will be made within 14 days after the date of resignation.

You will be paid salary and all benefits you are entitled to, accrued up until your last day.

Do not hesitate to reach out to [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot) for
any questions regarding payroll.

Insurance

Your insurance will be valid within 1 month after you visa cancellation date.

Your life insurance protection (Fidelity) will end on the visa cancellation date.

#### Visa/work permit cancellation

Depending on the type of visa you are employed, you will need to sign visa or work permit cancellation document.

#### Resignation ticket

To create a ticket for your resignation, please fill the [form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/).

Please specify the date of the resignation approved by your manager in the form and attach a screen of your resignation letter.

Please note that standard notice period for resignation  is 30 calendar days.

#### Expense reports

You must make sure you have submitted all outstanding expenses before you leave.

Expense report instruction can be found [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).

We highly recommend you submitting expense reports in advance.

#### Accesses

On your last working day your accesses will be blocked. You can reach out to HR Admin
via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### How can I create a ticket to apply for resignation?

Please fill the [form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/137377/) and attach a screenshot of your resignation letter. The ticket will
be automatically generated, HR Admin will contact you via the ticket if any additional information is needed.

#### Is this possible to receive a reference letter?

If you need a reference letter, please contact support via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).

#### How can I contact HR after the termination date?

Please send an email with your question on <helpy@yandex-team.ru>

#### Can I ask not to cancel my visa?

We can hold on your visa for not longer than 1 month after termination date, you are obliged to sign visa cancellation application when we
approach you.

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Topic: Payroll

This document provides information about salary payments, payslips, and payroll processes for employees in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Payroll
---

country: UAE topic: Payroll
-**Salary**Salary payment is done once a month, it is paid on the pre-last business
day, and sometimes can be paid a couple of days earlier if public holidays fall on salary payment date.

On the last working day you will receive a payslip with a payment breakdown. If you have any doubts about received amounts you can always
raise your question via [Helpy](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://t.me/YandexHelpDeskbot).**Reimbursement**Your expenses may be reimbursed if they are related to business needs.
When expense is approved by your manager, it is passed to the accountant who makes such payment in regular days, but not on the salary day.

To know how to reimburse click [here](https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/finances/business-expenses/kak-otchitatsja-po-rasxodam-inostrannye-jur-lica-h/).
If you do not have access to this page, you need to request for it.

|**Taxes and contributions**|
| --- |
|  |
| There is no personal income tax in the UAE for employees. |
For Emirati citizens --- 5% of salary is deducted monthly in favor of State Pension Plan**Payslip**On the last working day of the month you will receive a payslip with a
payment breakdown via ticket in the Tracker. You will also get an email from Tracker indicating the name of ticket with payslip inside of it. If
you have any doubts about received amounts, you can always raise your question via Helpy.

country: UAE topic: Psychological Support
- People, their physical and mental wellbeing, have always been at the
core of Yango. To create a comfortable environment where everyone feels looked after, we are offering a psychological support program for all
our employees across all our locations around the world.

[TELUS Health](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://www.telushealth.com/) (formely
LifeWorks) is a well-known and respected corporate support provider with over 50 years of experience offering technology-driven employee care and
HR services around the world.

TELUS Health service is free for company employees and available to everyone starting from their first day, including those on their
probation period.

All information related to your participation in the TELUS Health support program is strictly confidential. No information will be shared
with anyone without your informed, voluntary and written consent.

TELUS Health' support service can help you to solve a wide range of problems and challenges in your lives.
- Strengthen relationships and improve communication
- Deal with stress, anxiety and depression
- Resolve personal and emotional difficulties
- Address marital and relationship difficulties
- Understand grief and bereavement
- Find solutions for work-related issues
- Work towards life goals
- Cope with isolation and loneliness
- Adapt across cultures
- Identify and cope with culture shock
- Access crisis and trauma support**How many sessions are available?**| ---**5 sessions per issue**(unlimited number of issues per year) in |

With any technical issues with TELUS Health Web Portal or Mobile App, toll-free lines please
visit [help.lifeworks.com](https://h.yandex-team.ru/?https://help.lifeworks.com).

With any questions regarding the usage of the TELUS Health service, please contact <hr-medicine@yandex-team.ru>.

If there is no local toll-free number in your country, you can use [Cisco
Jabber](https://doc.yandex-team.ru/help/diy/common/telephony/cisco-jabber.html?lang=en) or [SIP telephony](https://doc.yandex-team.ru/help/diy/common/telephony/sip-telephony.html) for
International calls at no cost.

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Topic: Time Off

This document provides information about vacation planning, time off requests, and absence management for employees in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Time Off
---

country: UAE topic: Time Off
-**How to**Talk to your manager to discuss the dates of planning time off

Specify your time off at the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/) on Staff. For vacation set
it no less than 2 weeks before it starts

There will be a ticket automatically generated (VACATION / SICKLEAVE)

Your manager must confirm your planned time off in the ticket or at the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/)

Your planned time off will be acknowledged by HR Admin in the end of the month

Vacation does not affect payroll of the month in which the vacation is taken**General leaves****Annual leave**Each employee is entitled to 30 calendar days of annual leave, public
holidays are not included. You can enjoy your vacation in an uninterrupted 30 days manner upon your manager approval.**2024/2025**Your vacation balance accumulated by the end of 2024 year will be
carried over to 2025 year in full amount.**2025/2026 and further**Starting from 2025 year and the following years only 15 days of vacation balance can be carried over to next year. So the amount of days that
will be more than 15 as of the end of 2025 year will get vanished as soon as 2026 year starts.

|**Unpaid leave**|
| --- |
|  |
| On exceptional cases there is an option for you to take an unpaid |
| vacation. |
|  |
| This leave is granted only if there is a valid reason, which you must |
| specify in the application form (you can specify briefly «for |
| personal reasons» or «for family reasons»). The duration of such |
| leave is a point of discussion between you and your manager, but |
| is up to 30 days per year. |
Unpaid leave exceptional cases is at the discretion of the company.**Sick leave**If you do not attend work for 3 consecutive days because you are sick, you should provide a medical report from the UAE licensed medical
practitioner on your condition. Each employee is entitled to 90 consecutive or intermittent days of sick leave with sick leave
list per year.

First 30 days are paid fully, next 15 days are paid halfly, rest of the days are not paid.**Bereavement leave**You may be entitled to bereavement leave of 5 consecutive days in the
event of death of your spouse commencing from the date of death, 3 consecutive days in the event of the death of children, siblings,
grandchildren and grandparents.

Application for bereavement leave must be supported by documentary evidence and should be provided to your line manager as far in advance
as possible.**Childcare**If this is a current case and you need to take this vacation, please raise ticket via Helpy and HR admin will help you to organize childcare
leaves.**Maternity leave**As per company benefit an employee is granted a maternity leave following the below descriptions:

Start date: Maternity leave can be taken prior 1 month of the expected delivery date. Maternity leave can be used within 6 months after the
child birth. An employee can use available vacation leave balance before the maternity starts.

Duration: up to 120 days, first 60 days taken as a maternity leave, rest 60 days can be taken as paid leave (if vacation balance is
available)/unpaid leave. First 60 days of maternity leave should be taken at 1 stretch. If employee decides to use unpaid leave, it can be
taken only from the first day of any month, HR needs to be informed of it at least 15 days before the unpaid leave starts. A female employee
may, after using the maternity leave, be absent from work without pay for a period not exceeding continuous or intermittent 45 days if this
absence is due to her sickness or her child's sickness resulting from pregnancy or childbirth.

Payment: first 60 days of maternity leave are paid in 100% amount of the usual salary extra salary is paid as a bonus in the first month of
maternity leave (on the usual salary date), or can be paid on the usual salary date in the month preceding the month of maternity leave if HR is
informed of the future maternity leave start date at least 15 days before it begins.

Documents: You need to attach doctors report with expected delivery date indicate. After the birth has taken place, please, attach childbirth
certificate to the maternity leave ticket.**Paternity leave**Parental leave is granted to fathers or mothers to take care of their child.

It is granted 5 days of paid leave, it cannot be waived or substituted.

This leave can be used with 6 months after the child birth. An employee's normal weekend off-day would not be included as part of the
leave.

Steps to add paternity leave:

Select Maternity Leave

Add 5 days of Leave

Add "Paternity Leave" in the description

![](media/image1.png){width="3.291836176727909in" height="3.8196402012248467in"}**How can I get access to Absence Planner?**Please contact your manager. Your manager is responsible to grant you
access to the [Absence Planner](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/gap/).**I was sick, but I don't have a medical certificate.**If you were sick not more than 3 days, you do not need to provide medical confirmation. Medical confirmation is required in order that
absences more than 3 days are not considered unjustified absences. Please contact your manager to discuss your absence and the better way
to cover it.**What happens if my manager didn't approve my vacation?**This absence will be considered as unjustified absences. Please make sure that your manager properly confirmed your days of rest.**Where can I check an available number of days for annual leave?**Approximate number is shown on your Staff page.

Your vacation balance on Staff is updated on the first week of each month and it is relevant as of the last day of the previous month.**Can I change or cancel the vacation, if it was already confirmed?**You can both change and cancel your approved vacation.

You will need to update the dates of your vacation at Absence planner and follow the process «How to» starting from the step № 4.

To cancel you vacation please use the Absence planner as well.

country: UAE topic: Travel
- Per each day of business trip, you are eligible to receive per diem
(daily allowance). The daily rate depends on a country you travel to, and the daily amount covers two visits to medium-priced restaurants and
two taxi rides.

Per diems will be paid in the nearest salary payment after your business trip finishes. If your business trip ends after payroll cut-off date
(approx 20 days of each month), then your per diem will be paid in next salary. The payment will be in AED.

You do not have to provide us with proofs of expenses of daily allowance amounts. You may reimburse additional expenses upon approval of your
manager.**How to organise business trip for the employees of UAE office****General rules**Please plan and create business trips as far in advance as possible. Below are the recommended minimum terms for creating a ticket for a
business trip:\
- Domestic business trip within a country - 5-7 days.\
- Foreign business trip (visa not necessary) - 2,5-3 weeks\
- Foreign business trip (visa needed) - 5-6 weeks\
- US business trip (visa required) - 3-4 months (time frame depends on
availability of visa slots).

To issue a TRAVEL request go to <https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/>
1. Create a TRAVEL ticket
- Apply for a business trip via special [form in service
  Y.Trip.](https://trip.yandex-team.ru/trips/new/)
- Travel ticket with a status "Open" will be created automatically in
  addition to the application.
- Purchasing of all services is managed via Y.Trip. After the approval
  process is completed you need to add all the services on the main page of your application in Y.Trip and click the yellow button "Book
  all".
- Any question during the process can be asked in the support chat
  through the yellow button "Ask a question". If for some reason the support chat didn't start, then you need to link your personal Yandex
  account to the Staff and the button will appear.
- If you mark "External Conference" as a purpose of your business trip
  you will see a special form for comments -- please specify all details. Thus you will have two tickets: TRAVEL and INTERCONF. You
  should buy a ticket to the conference yourself using your personal or corporate card. The Conference group will coordinate you in case you
  need help in purchasing a ticket for the conference. Please address all questions about conference in the INTERCONF ticket.
- If you are going on a business trip the first time please see the
  detailed [instruction.](https://jing.yandex-team.ru/files/anngolovina/Instruction.docx)
2. Trip approval
- Your immediate superior will be automatically invited to approve the
  trip. If you are going abroad, the superior manager will also be automatically invited to approve.
- After the approval process the status of your application will be
  changed to "approved". Please wait to finalise approval process before you start booking tickets and hotel.
3. Travel policy: tickets, hotels, etc.

You can choose options according to our travel policy.

Flights:**Economy:**\ Select an economy class flight that's not over 50% more expensive than
the cheapest results shown, and complies with the following conditions:
- If direct, the flight is not with a low-cost airline, and includes
one item of luggage plus hand luggage.\
- If indirect, the flight has as few connections as possible and
avoids countries with visa requirements (e.g. the Shengen zone or the USA). It must also not be with a low-cost airline, and include one item
of luggage plus hand luggage.**Comfort:**longer than 6 hours

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting**Business:**only for segment longer than 8 hours (connection flights don't count)

trip purpose: Business negotiations with external partners, Speaker on external conferences, Participation in a court session, Engineering and
installation works, IT Infrastructure support, Board of Directors, Production, Logistics, Recruiting}\>**Railway tickets**Compartment in night trains; economy and comfort seats in speed trains**Transfer**You can have a prepaid transfer to and from an airport/railway station
in the city of departure and in the city of your business trip. It can be arranged by the agency or by yourself (reimbursable)**Taxi**In applications created through the Yandex.Business trips, taxi access
opens automatically the day before the start of the trip. Access is applicable only in the UAE.\
You can take a Business Class taxi to and from the airport.\ Please note: Taxi rides in the city, including trips from the hotel to
the office and back, are not charged.

How to order a corporate taxi:
1. Install the Yandex Go app
2. Log in using the primary phone number listed in your profile on the
    Yandex.Money service.Business trips
3. Select the "Business Trip (your legal entity)" payment method in
    the application
4. Order a taxi at the Business Class rate - the money will be debited
    not from your card, but from your corporate account.
5. There is no need to make travel accounting documents.**Car rental**Accepted in USA, Finland, Israel, Uzbekistan.\
The use of a personal car for domestic business trips is not recommended.**Visa**Please contact the consulate of the country you are travelling to or a
local visa services providers in good time before your planned date of travel.\
If you need any assistance, please inform us in the ticket.**Per Diem**UAE - 80 \$/per day

When choosing the goal "Long trip to the product region" 50% of the established daily allowance is paid.**Change/cancel trip, make report****Report**- Colleagues from the HR department will close the ticket themselves as
  soon as they make the payment for daily allowance.
- If you buy tickets or book a hotel for a business trip at your own
  expense you should create expense report via [special form.](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/170915/) and attach
  receipts for reimbursement.
- If you paid for conference ticket using your personal or corporate
  card, you must also add it to the report to get reimbursement.

You don`t have to report on services bought via the agency.**Cancellation**Click the "Cancel my trip" button in Y.Trip. You will receive information on cancellation penalties in the support chat.

In case of cancellation for a valid reason (illness, cancellation at the company's initiative, cancellation of an event or meetings with
partners, etc.) no penalties will be applied on you. In other cases the withholding of penalties will be agreed with your HR partner.**Change of dates**If you need to change the dates of the trip, then you need:
- approve it with your Manager in the Travel Ticket and after that click
  on the "Change travel dates" button on the top right corner of the page in your application in Y.Trip;
- send a message to the support chat and ask to change the ticket and/or
  hotel booking and wait for the answer.**Change of services**If you need to change services without changing the dates, then you need:
- get confirmation from your Manager in the Travel Ticket;
- send a message to the support chat about the necessary change, they
  will inform you about penalties.

After your confirmation the agency will make changes and send new tickets/hotel voucher to the Ticket.

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Office: Internet City, Topic: Fire Safety

This document provides information about fire safety systems and procedures for the Internet City office in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:

region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Fire Safety
---

country: UAE topic: Fire Safety
- Dubai Internet City 4 (DIC 4) is a three-floored building.

The building is equipped with an automatic fire alarm, warning and evacuation control system, automatic fire extinguishing system, internal
fire water supply and fire extinguishers.

Our office is located on the 2nd floor (Level 1), from which there are 2 emergency exits (staircases).

![](media/image1.png){width="6.496527777777778in" height="4.845833333333333in"}

Emergency exit No. 1:

![](media/image2.png){width="6.496527777777778in" height="5.482638888888889in"}

Emergency exit No. 2:

![](media/image3.png){width="6.496527777777778in" height="5.656944444444444in"}**When the fire alarm is turned on, the escape doors are automatically
unlocked. If this does not happen, please use [the green forced unlock button](http://clubs.at.yandex-team.ru/ops/1531).**The emergency assembly point is located 50 meters from the main entrance
and is marked with a green sign**"Assembly Point".**![](media/image4.png){width="6.496527777777778in" height="5.490277777777778in"}

![](media/image5.png){width="5.6639096675415574in" height="3.22742782152231in"}**What should I know about fire safety regulations in the office?**- Cigarettes, hookahs, vaporizers, and all types of electronic smoking
  devices cannot be used in office. Smoking is permitted only in designated areas.
- Evacuation routes and exits must be clear at all times.
- Do not use faulty electrical appliances, sockets, switches, wires,
  etc.
- Do not hang anything on detectors or sprinklers (devices for detecting
  a fire, spraying water in the event of a fire, located under the ceiling), and do not place heating devices near them.
- Do not use candles, sparklers, pyrotechnics, or smoke generators in
  the office.
- Do not overheat food in the microwave or place metal utensils in it.
- Do not stack or store foreign objects in technical rooms.
- Notify the office person in charge of any violations.**What should I do if I detect a fire or signs of burning?**- Calm down and try to determine where the danger is coming from.
- Notify building occupants by pressing the fire alarm button if the
  automatic fire alarm does not operate.
- Leave the building using the nearest emergency exit.
- Report the fire by phone to the person in charge in the office or by
  phone from a mobile phone in**Dubai Civil Defense -- 997**. You need to provide: the address of the building, the location of the fire,
  your first and last name.

####**What are the basic rules for evacuating?**- Go straight to the emergency exit. If it is blocked, use another exit.
- Stay calm: don't run, don't come back for things.
- Don't use elevators.
- Close the doors behind you to prevent fire and smoke from spreading.
- Do not walk through smoky areas. If you do get caught in smoke, crawl
  and crouch down.
- Once you leave the building, do not return. Get to the meeting point
  and wait for permission from the office person in charge to return.

####**What should I know if I decide to put out a fire?**If conditions allow and there is no threat to life and health, the
employee can try to put out the fire using a fire extinguisher:
1. Break the seal and pull out the pin.
2. Point the nozzle at the fire and press the lever.\
    Safe work with a fire extinguisher:
- The source of fire should not be large (no more than 1 m2, flame no
  more than 1.5 m).
- You need to start extinguishing at the base of the fire. If the fire
  is in a niche, extinguish it from above.
- When extinguishing, it is better to stand with your back or side to
  the door so that you can escape.
- Electrical appliances must be de-energized before extinguishing.

####**If I have questions about fire safety, where can I go?**Fill out [the form](https://helpy.yandex-team.ru/?form=pb) on Helpy or
write to our mailing list [fire-info@](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/fire-info).

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Office: Internet City, Topic: Parking

This document provides information about parking facilities and procedures for the Internet City office in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Parking
---

country: UAE topic: Parking
-**Parking for employees**We have 20 parking slots located in front of the building DIC@4.

To get a parking access card, please, fill the [form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13681443/).\
\ The following documents have to be submitted:\
\ • Emirates ID (both sides);\
• Car registration card (both sides);\ • Valid driving license (both sides);\
• Car insurance.\ \
It is recommended that you keep your parking permit in your vehicle in case there is an issue with recognizing your vehicle plate number.\
\ You can get into our office on level 1 using a Yandex badge.**Parking entrance**With the plate recognition system, you can access the permanent parking
area automatically once your vehicle is registered.\ \
You can choose any available slot within the parking area at your convenience.**Parking exit**Your plate numbers will be automatically scanned for the exit.\
\ Parking access card is individual. It can't be handed over to a
colleague or a guest.\ \
Parking slots are limited. Only employees with 4+ days In-Office work mode are eligible for the parking.**Parking for guests and visitors**First 1 hour - Free.\
\ Over 1 hour - AED 10 Per Hour.**Payment process**• Pay by entering your vehicle's plate number at any pay station before
exiting;\ \
• Cash and credit card payment are accepted at the pay station OR credit card - at the exit gates;\
\ • Pay station accepts AED 10, 20, 50, 100;\
\ • Users must exit the car park within 20 minutes from the time of
payment;\ \
• Parking fees will apply if re-entering the parking within 2 hours.**Important terms and conditions**• The car park is open 24/7, however, overnight parking is prohibited;\ \
• Any vehicle left in the car park for 48 hours or more will be reported to local authorities;\
\ • All accidents and incidents have to be reported to security
personnel.\ \
• In case of emergencies related to parking:\ \
Security personnel are present at all parking areas and can be contacted on +971 4 360 1777;\
\ All parking barriers have an intercom button to talk to the operator.

![](media/image1.png){width="6.496527777777778in" height="3.5541666666666667in"}

country: UAE topic: Printer
-**How to connect on Windows**1\. Click the "Start" menu and then choose "Settings".\
\
2. Then click "Add printer or scanner".\
\
3. Wait for manual enter button.\
\
4. Click button "Add printer with current IP-Address\...".\
\
5. Type of device - TCP/IP.\
\
6. Type IP Address of nearest Printer (f.e. on [*the staff
map*](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/map/equipment/28065/)).\ \
7. In case of choose type of driver: choose MS Publisher Color Printer.\
\
8. Profit!**How to connect on MacOS**1\. Find Printers using Spotlight Search (upper right corner).\
\
2. Click "+" under the list of devices.\
\
3. Type IP Address of nearest Printer (f.e. on [*the staff
map*](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/map/equipment/28065/)).\ \
4. Click "Next".\
\
5. Profit!

# Region: MENAP, Country: UAE, Office: One Central, Topic: Access

This document provides information about building access procedures for first-time visitors and employees at the One Central office in UAE.

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
---
region: MENAP country: UAE
topic: Access
---

country: UAE topic: Access
-**First time in the office**1\. Come to the Reception on 1st floor and say that you are here for
Yango. Also say that it's your first time in this office.\ \
2. Inform the receptionist that you are here for Yango and that this is
your first visit.\ \
3. Present your identification document (passport or Emirates ID) for
registration in the building system. You will be also asked to provide your phone number.\
\
4. Once registred, security will allow you to pass through the
turnstile. Just ask them to open it for you.**Office access for employees**To access Yango office (6th floor), you will need Yango badge.\ If you don't have Yango badge: Please contact [Natalia
Iakovleva](https://staff.yandex-team.ru/ni10).\ \
Access through the turnstile on the 1st floor is provided by:\ • Building access card;\
• Identification document (passport or Emirates ID).\ \
Building access cards are available only for the employees with Emirates ID and a workplace in One Central office. To get an access card, please
submit [One Central Access Card form](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/159554/). Processing time for
a building access card is 1-2 business days.\ \**Important!**\
\ • Each access card is individual and using someone's else card is
strictly prohibited.\ • Sharing your access card with others is also illegal.\
\ Please respect the building security protocols and follow the
instructions provided.**If you lost the badge or access card**If you lost your badge or access card, please submit [Helpy Reissue the Pass form](https://help.yandex-team.ru/?form=fairy).**Guest Access**There are two ways to welcome guests to the office:\
\
*Option 1:\
*\
Guest registers at the reception desk on the 1st floor and takes the elevator to the 6th floor. You will meet the guest on the 6th floor.\
*\
Option 2:*\ \
You meet the guest on the 1st floor. Guest registers at the reception desk and you escort the guest to the 6th floor.\
\ If you need guest parking place - please, fill the [**following
form**](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13682349/).\ \**Guest Parking**\
\ If you need to arrange parking for a guest, please fill out [**One
Central Guest Parking form**](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/ext/surveys/13682349/).

####
